Damara: Je-ho-va ǃKhū ǀgai-sa tsî du a ǁkhā, tsî ûib di mā-ao tsî ǃnâb di Ku-ru-ao. Ku-rus ge Sa-du ǀgai-ba ra ǁgau da; sa-du kai-tsēs nēn hoa-na nî ǁgau.
English: Jehovah our God, exalted in might, Creator of life and Provider of light. Creation speaks of your power so grand; The heavens and earth forever stand.

Damara: ǂHa-nu-ai as ge sa-du di tron-sa. Sa-du ǂha-nu-ga hoa-ǁae ra ǂan-ǂan da. Tsēs hoa-sa da sa-du mîs ǃnâ ra mû, sa-du di gā-ai-sib ra mâ-ǂoa.
English: Your heavenly throne, on justice it stands. To us you make known all your righteous commands. And as we turn to your Word, we can see Your wisdom revealed so brilliantly.

Damara: Tsî ǃgō-sa-se sa-du di kai ǀnam-ma. Tā-tsē da a mā-da-wa ǁoa kai ǀkhaeb ge. Sa-du ǀgau-gu tsî ǃgôa-he-sa ǀon-sa, tsî da nî-ra koa du ǂkhîb hoab ǀkha.
English: The greatest of all is your perfect love. Beyond all compare are your gifts from above. Your attributes and your glorious name, With joy and with zeal, we will proclaim.

Damara: Bu-ru-xa a E-lob— Hoa-na ge a ku-ru-ba. Mâ-ǁaes hoas ǃnâ nî hâ-ba— Je-ho-va tib ǀon hâ. ǃGôa-sa tsî da ǂnī-sa, sa-du ǀhao-hâb ǃnâ hâ-sa. ǃHaos tsî ǁaes tsîn hoa-na xu, sa-du xa da nî ǃhoa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va, Je-ho-va, ǀkha-ra E-lo i ǀkhai. ǀHom-mi ǃnâs kas E-lo i ǀkhai tsî ǃhūb-aib ais tsî-na. Sa-du ǀgui du a hoa-ǀgai-xa, nēs xan ge hoa-na ǂan. Je-ho-va, Je-ho-va, ǀnî hâ E-lo-i ge a ǀkhai.
English: The living and true God— The God of all creation In ev’ry generation— Jehovah is your name. We’re honored and we’re proud To be your congregation. In ev’ry tribe and nation, Your glory we proclaim. (CHORUS) Jehovah, Jehovah, There is no God like you. There’s no other in the heavens Or on the earth below. You alone are God Almighty, And this all men must know. Jehovah, Jehovah, We have no other God but you.

Damara: Sa-du ra ī kai da, ǂgao du ra kha-mi hoa-ǁae, Sa-du ǂhâ-ba hâ kha-mi— Je-ho-vab ge a ǁî. Sa-du ǃhoa-aon a-se, nē-sa du ge ī-ǁkhā-kai. Kai-se da ge a ǃgôa-sa Sa-du di khoen a-se. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va, Je-ho-va, ǀkha-ra E-lo i ǀkhai. ǀHom-mi ǃnâs kas E-lo i ǀkhai tsî ǃhūb-aib ais tsî-na. Sa-du ǀgui du a hoa-ǀgai-xa, nēs xan ge hoa-na ǂan. Je-ho-va, Je-ho-va, ǀnî hâ E-lo-i ge a ǀkhai.
English: You cause us to become Whatever you desire, To do as you require— Jehovah is your name. And Witnesses for you Is what you’ve kindly named us. We’re honored you have claimed us— A people for your name. (CHORUS) Jehovah, Jehovah, There is no God like you. There’s no other in the heavens Or on the earth below. You alone are God Almighty, And this all men must know. Jehovah, Jehovah, We have no other God but you.

Damara: Si-da E-lo-tse, sa-du ge ǂkhîb, ǃâu-ba-sen-sa ra mā. Nē ǃâu-ba-sens xa da ge hoa khoe-na nî-ra mî-ba. Ûib ǃgom-si-gu ga hā-ǂam da o, o da ge ra ǃao kai-he. ǃÂu-ba-sens hî-na ra ǃnâs ge ǁkha-wa go ǃkhae-ba da. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Si-da ǀgai, si-da ǃâu-ba-sen, tsî ǂgom-ǃgâ. ǂHâ da hâ-na du ge ra mā. Ao-ǁnâs ǃnâs, ǁkhā-ǁkhās ǃnâs, ǂgom-ǃgâ-si-ba da ge ū-hâ sa-du di huib ǃnâ.
English: O Jehovah, you have given us a hope that we hold dear. It’s a hope we find so thrilling we want the world to hear. But at times this life’s anxieties are the cause of fears within, And the hope that burned so brightly has suddenly grown dim. (CHORUS) You’re our strength, you’re our hope, you’re our confidence. Whatever we lack, you supply. When we preach, when we teach, we have confidence because it’s on you we rely.

Damara: To-xo-ba du ǁkhā-ǁkhā da re î, da tā sa-do ǀu-ru. Sa-du ge si-da ra ǁkhae-ǂgao, ǃgom-si-gu ga hā o. Nē ǂâi-di ge ǃnâb hî-na go ro, kā-ba ǁkha-wa ra ǃnâ kai. Nēs ǀgai-ba ra mā da î da Sa-du di ǀon-sa koa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Si-da ǀgai, si-da ǃâu-ba-sen, tsî ǂgom-ǃgâ. ǂHâ da hâ-na du ge ra mā. Ao-ǁnâs ǃnâs, ǁkhā-ǁkhās ǃnâs, ǂgom-ǃgâ-si-ba da ge ū-hâ sa-du di huib ǃnâ.
English: So Jehovah, please instill in us a heart that won’t forget, For you’ve always been our comfort when troubled times we’ve met. And these thoughts that lift and strengthen us can revive that dying flame, For they fill our hearts with courage to speak about your name. (CHORUS) You’re our strength, you’re our hope, you’re our confidence. Whatever we lack, you supply. When we preach, when we teach, we have confidence because it’s on you we rely.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ge ti ǃûi-ao-ba; ǁîb dao-ǁgau-sa ta nî sao. ǁÎb ge ti ǂgaob ǂhan-sen-de a ǂan; ǁÎb ge nî-ra kō-ǃgâ te. Tsî a-mab ǃnâ ra ǂgae-ǂgui te, ti-ta ǃûi-ǃgâ tsî ra ǀkhae. Tsîb hoa-ǁae ǀnam-mi ǃnâ ra dao-ǁgau te. Ti ǀom-sab ra ǃûi tsî ǀkhae. Tsîb ge ǀnam-mi ǃnâ ra dao-ǁgau te, ti ǀom-sab ra ǃûi tsî ǀkhae.
English: Jehovah God is my Shepherd; I’ll follow where he will lead. He knows my hopes and my heart’s desire; He knows what I truly need. To watered pastures he leads me, To places secure and blessed. And he guides me always with loyal love To where I find peace and rest. He guides me always with loyal love To where I find peace and rest.

Damara: Sa-du dao-ǁgau di ge a ǃgâi, tsî sa-du ǂha-nu-ai-sib. Hoa-ǁae ta sa-du ǀons ǃnâ nî ǃgû; tsî ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se nî hâ. ǃKhae-nab ǃnâb ra kō-ǃgâ te o; ǃgom-si-gab ra ǃkham-ba te. Je-ho-va E-lob ge ti-ta nî hui, ǁîb ti ǀhō-sa a-ma-ga. Je-ho-va E-lob ge nî hui te, ǁîb ti ǀhō-sa a-ma-ga.
English: Refreshing are all your pathways, The ways of your righteousness. For your name’s sake never let me stray From walking in faithfulness. In valleys deep in the shadows, Assured by your staff and rod, I will fear no danger of lasting harm, For you are my Friend and God. I fear no danger of lasting harm, For you are my Friend and God.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ge ti ǃûi-ao-ba, ǁîb mî-mā-de ta nî sao. Ti E-lob ge nî-ra ǁkhae-ǂgao te tsî tsam-tsî-ǃnâ-na nî hui. Sa-du hoa-ǀgai-xa a-ma-ga ta sa-du ǃnâ ra ǂgom-ǃgâ. ǁÎb ǀkhom-xa-ǂgao-si-gu ge kai-se ǃgâi. ǃKhū-ba ta ge nî ǃoa-ba. ǁÎb ǀkhom-xa-ǂgao-si-gu kai-se ǃgâi. ǃKhū-ba ta ge nî ǃoa-ba.
English: Jehovah, you are my Shepherd; I follow where you will lead. You strengthen me, and you give me rest; You give all I truly need. As you most surely are living, So sure is my hope in you. May your loyal love and your care for me Pursue me my whole life through. Your loyal love and your care for me Pursue me my whole life through.

Damara: ǃKhūb ge ti ǂâi-ǂhan-sen-de a ǂan, ǁîb ge ti ǁoms tsî khâis tsî-na a ǂan. Sa-du ge ti ǂgaob di ǂâi-di hoa-de ǂan, ti mî-di tsî ǃgû ǀgaub tsî-na, hoa-na du ǂan. Ti ǂkhōn Sa-du ai-ǃâ sâu-he ǁoa, ti ǃnae-sa xu du ge a ǂan te o. Sa-du ge ti ku-ru-sa ǃgâi-se ge mû, Sa-du ku-ru-sa ta a ǀnam tsî Sa-du ǀgaib. Sa-du gā-ai-sib ge kai-se ǂoa-ǂam-sa, Sa-du dī-gu xas ge ti ǀom-sa ǂan. Nē-si ta ga ǃkhaeb xa ga ra ǃao xa-web, E-lo-ba ôa te tsî nî ǁkhau-ba te. E-lo-ba xu ta a sâu-sen ǁkhā? E-lob ai-sa xu ta mâ-ba gau ǁkhā? ǀHo-bas ǃnâs kas, ǀhom-mi ǃnâs kas xa-we o, ǃkhae-nab ǃnâs kas tsî hu-rib ǃnâ; ǃkhai-i a ǀkhai.
English: O God, you know my rest and waking, When I lie down and when I rise anew. You search my thoughts, my inmost inclination, The words I speak, the ways I walk, you know them too. You saw when I was made in secret, My very bones not hidden from your sight. You saw my form; its parts were down in writing. I love the wonder of your ways and praise your might. Your knowledge, God, is wondrous, awe-inspiring; Of this my soul is very well-aware. If I should fear that darkness might enfold me, Your spirit, God, would find me, even there. Where could I hide from you, Jehovah, Or be concealed, be hidden from your face? Not in the Grave nor in the highest heaven, Not in the dark nor in the sea; there is no place.

Damara: Ku-rus ge Je-ho-vab di ǀgau-ga ra ǁgau. ǁÎb di sî-sen-ga da ge ǀhom-aib ǃnâ ra mû. ǁÎb ǃgâi-si-ba da tsēs hoa-sa ra mû. ǀHom-aib ge ǁÎb ǀgaib, gā-ai-sib tsî ǀnam-mi xa ra ǂhôa.
English: Gracious Jehovah, our strength and our might, You are our Savior, in you we delight. We are your Witnesses bearing your news, Whether men hear or they proudly refuse. (CHORUS) Jehovah, our Rock, Our strength and our might, Your name we make known Both day and night. Glorious Jehovah, Almighty in pow’r, You are our hiding place; You are our Tow’r.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ǂha-nub ge ûi-ba ra ǃgâi-ǃgâi. ǁÎb ge hoa khoe-na ǀnam-mi ǃna-ga ra dao-ǁgau. E-lob di ǂgae-ǂguis ge a ǂha-nu-ai. ǁÎb mîs tsî ǂha-nub tsîn ge a ǃa-nu tsî a a-ma.
English: We who now serve you rejoice in your light; Eyes that are opened now see truth and right. Searching the Scriptures, we hear your command; Making our choice, for your Kingdom we stand. (CHORUS) Jehovah, our Rock, Our strength and our might, Your name we make known Both day and night. Glorious Jehovah, Almighty in pow’r, You are our hiding place; You are our Tow’r.

Damara: E-lo-ǃao-ǃgâ-xa-sib ge kai-se a ǃgâi. ǁÎb mî-mâi-di ge ǃhu-ni-ǀu-rib xa ǀga-pi. ǁÎb dao-ǁgau-di ge ûi-ba ra mā da. ǁÎb ǂkhai-sib tsî ǀons ǃnâ da ge ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se nî hâ.
English: Gladly, O God, we keep doing your will. Though Satan mocks us, we’re trusting you still. Though he may slay us, oh, help us to be Firm to the end for your grand Sov’reignty. (CHORUS) Jehovah, our Rock, Our strength and our might, Your name we make known Both day and night. Glorious Jehovah, Almighty in pow’r, You are our hiding place; You are our Tow’r.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ǀkhom-xa-ǂgao-sib di E-lob, si-da ǀgaib ǁÎb ge a si-da ǃûi-ao. Sa-du di ǀons xa da ge ra ao-ǁnâ, khoen ga ǃgâ ta-ma ga ra ī xa-we. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va E-lob ǀgai-sa tsî a ǁkhāb. Sa-du ǀons xa da nî-ra ǂan-ǂan. Bu-ru-xa E-lob, ǁÎb hoan-xa ǀga-pi. Sa-du ge a si-da di sâu-ǃkhai o.
English: Jehovah is our refuge, Our God in whom we trust. His shadow is our shelter; Remain in it we must. His faithful ones he will defend, On this we know we can depend. Jehovah is a stronghold, Ever faithful, loyal, and just.

Damara: ǃGâi-a-ǂgaob ǀkha da ge nî ǃoa-ba du. A-mab Sa-du Gao-sib dīb ra ǂkhî kai. Sa-du mî-sa khom-ais ra gā-ai kai. Mâ-ǁa-po da nî Sa-du gao-sib ǃgao. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va E-lob ǀgai-sa tsî a ǁkhāb. Sa-du ǀons xa da nî-ra ǂan-ǂan. Bu-ru-xa E-lob, ǁÎb hoan-xa ǀga-pi. Sa-du ge a si-da di sâu-ǃkhai o.
English: Though thousands will have fallen And many at our side, The righteous and the meek ones Will never be denied. So in our hearts we need not fear; Calamity will not come near. From danger he will shield us, For beneath God’s wings we’ll reside.

Damara: Hoa-ǁae da Sa-du ǂâi-sa ra dī ǂgao. ǃKhā-ǃkhān ga xa-we da ǀū-sen ti-de. ǁGâ-uab ra ǃgam da ǂgao, xa-we hui da, î da hoa-ǁae Sa-du ai ǂgom-ai-ǂnûi. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va E-lob ǀgai-sa tsî a ǁkhāb. Sa-du ǀons xa da nî-ra ǂan-ǂan. Bu-ru-xa E-lob, ǁÎb hoan-xa ǀga-pi. Sa-du ge a si-da di sâu-ǃkhai o.
English: He’ll keep us and protect us From snares along our way, From terrors in the nighttime, And arrows by the day. Yes, there will be no cause for dread, No place where we will fear to tread. Jehovah is our refuge, Ever guarding us on our way.

Damara: ǃKhūb ge a si-da sâu-ǃkhai, E-lob ǂgom ai da rab. ǁÎb soms ge si-da sâu-ǃkhai, ǁîs ǃnâ da ge nî hâ. ǁÎb ge ǂhau-ǃnâ-na ra ǁkhau-ba, nēs ǃnâ da ge nî ǂgom-ai-ǂnûi. E-lob ge a si-da ǀgai, ǂgom-ǂgom-sa tsîb hoa-ǁae a ǃgâi.
English: Rejoice, give glory to Jehovah, For the heavens proclaim all his righteousness. Let us sing to our God joyful songs to his praise; Let us speak to all of his great acts. (CHORUS) Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King! Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King!

Damara: Khoen ga mâ-ǃoa da xa-wen, ǂgui-na sa-da ǀkha hâ. ǃGam-ǃgam-sen ran ge tā-tsēs tsî-na xū-he ti-de. ǃGom-si-gu ga ra hā-ǂam da, xa-we da tā-tsē ǃao ti-de. Tsū-ba xub ge nî hui da, ǃKhūb ǃna-ga da ge a hâ ǁkhā.
English: His glory tell among the nations; For Jehovah to us is a God who saves. Yes, Jehovah is King; he deserves all the praise. So we bow before his mighty throne. (CHORUS) Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King! Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King!

Damara: ǁÎb nî kō-ǃgâ tsî hui da hā-nî ǃgom-si-ga xu, tsu-xub ǃnâs kas, hoa-sa o, tsē-ǃgâ-ǁaeb ǃnâs tsî-na. ǃAo da nî xū-i ge a ǀkhai, E-lob ǃnâ da ra ǂgom xui-ao. E-lob ge si-da sâu-ǃkhai, ǁÎb hoa-ǁae si-da ra dao-ǁgau.
English: His righteous rule is now established. On his throne, he has placed his anointed Son. Let the gods of this world be brought down and be shamed, For the praise belongs to God alone. (CHORUS) Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King! Let the heavens rejoice, Let the earth joyful be, For Jehovah has become our King!

Damara: Je-ho-va-ba ǂkhai-si-ba mā re, ǀhom-mi ge ǁÎb di ǂkhai-si-ba ra ǁgau da. Hā re î da Je-ho-va-ba ǁnae-ba hoa-ǁae tsî ǁîb di ǃgâi dī-gu xa ao-ǁnâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai! Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai!
English: Praise our God! Praise Jehovah God! Make his glorious name known to all! Sound alarm, For his day is near, Help all people hear his warning call. Jehovah decreed that now is the time For his Firstborn to rule as King. Reach out to all people, tell them the news, Tell what blessings our God will bring! (CHORUS) Praise our God! Praise Jehovah God! Make his greatness known in all the earth!

Damara: E-lob xa a da khoe-na mî-ba; ǁÎb a si-da di Ku-ru-ao a-ma-ga. ǁÎb ge si-da gao-ao tsîb koa-he-sa a-nu, nē-sis tsî ǀam-o-sib hoab kō-se. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai! Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai!
English: Praise our God! Sing it loud and clear! With a joyful song, laud his name! From the heart, From a grateful heart, All his glory boldly we proclaim. Though grand is our God and great are his works, He is humble and good to all. Our merciful Father knows what we need; He responds when he hears our call. (CHORUS) Praise our God! Praise Jehovah God! Make his greatness known in all the earth!

Damara: ǁÎb gao-sib ǂha-nu-ai-sib ai mâ. Tron-sa ǀgôa-ba ge mā, ǁÎb ǂkhau-he-sa-ba. A gu nē ǃhūb-aib di gao-ao-ga tao-tao-he. E-lob ǀguib koa-he-sa a-nu hâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai! Ab ǀhom-mi tsî ǃhūb-aib tsî kha ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, si-da E-lob ge go gao-ao kai!
English: Your glory, God, your mighty works abound, In skies above, their praise for you resounds. Creation speaks without a voice or word; In all the earth, its message can be heard. Creation speaks without a voice or word; In all the earth, its message can be heard.

Damara: Ka-re re! Si-da E-lo-baǃ ǁÎb ǀons xa hoa khoe-na mî-baǃ ǁÎb ǁaib di tsēs ge go ǀgū toa, Hoa khoe-na hui re în nēs xa ǁnâu. Nē-sab ge Je-ho-va-ba ge mî-mâi. ǁÎb ǀgôab ge Gao-se ra ǂgae-ǂgui. ǃHūb-aib ǂha-wa-se khoe-na mî-ba re, E-lob tae-na nî-ra dī-sa! (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ka-re re! Si-da E-lo-ba! ǁÎb ǃgâi-sib xa khoe-na mî-ba re!
English: True wisdom starts with wholesome fear of you And guards our way in all we say and do. Your wise commands enlighten young and old— A treasure far exceeding finest gold. Your wise commands enlighten young and old— A treasure far exceeding finest gold.

Damara: Ka-re reǃ ǁÎ-ba ǁnae-ba re! ǁÎ-ba koa, ǁîb a kai xui-ge! ǂGao-ba xu, gan-gan-xa ǂgaob ǀkha, ǁÎb ǂkhai-sib xa da nî-ra ao-ǁnâ. ǁÎb ge ku-ru xūn ge a ǂoa-ǂam-sa. ǁÎb ge hoan ǃoa-gu a ǂhau-ǃnâ. E-lob ge si-da ǂhâ-si-ga a ǂan; tsî si-da ǀgo-re-de ra ǁnâu. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ka-re re! Si-da E-lo-ba! ǁÎb ǃgâi-sib xa khoe-na mî-ba re!
English: By knowing you, our life is not in vain, And by your word, our life will be sustained. The greatest honor anyone can gain Will come to all who sanctify your name. The greatest honor anyone can gain Will come to all who sanctify your name.

Damara: E-lob ǀgaib ge ku-rus ǃnâ ra mû-he, ǀhom-mi tsîn ge nē-sa ra ǁgau-ǂui o. Ku-rus ge ǁÎb di kai ǀnam-ma ra ǁgau. ǃHūb-aib hoab ge ǁîb mî-sa nî-ra ǁnâu. Ku-rus ge ǁÎb di kai ǀnam-ma ra ǁgau. ǃHūb-aib hoab ge ǁîb mî-sa nî-ra ǁnâu.
English: Great God, Jehovah, you are deserving, Worthy of the highest praise, Good and just in all your ways. You have such power, deep love, and wisdom. You are God to endless days.

Damara: Gā-ai-sib sa-do ǃaos ǀkha ra tsoa-tsoa tsî nēs ge si-da hoa-ǁae ra dao-ǁgau. Nēs ǂkha-man tsî kai-ra-na ǃkhō-ǂgā hâ— Nēs ge a ǀō-ai-sa hoa xūn ǂam-ai. Nēs ǂkha-man tsî kai-ra-na ǃkhō-ǂgā hâ— Nēs ge a ǀō-ai-sa hoa xūn ǂam-ai.
English: Father, we feel your tender compassion. We are dust, and still you care; Graciously you hear our prayer. How you sustain us, teach us, and guide us! Help from you is always there.

Damara: Si-da ûib ge ǂâi-ba-sen-sa ū-hâ tsî sa-du mîs ge ǁkhā-si-ba ra mā. Nēs ge kai-se ǀga-pi ǀhō-sa-si-sa, ǁîn hî-na sa-du ǀon-sa ra ǃgôan ǃgao. Nēs ge kai-se ǀga-pi ǀhō-sa-si-sa, ǁîn hî-na sa-du ǀon-sa ra ǃgôan ǃgao.
English: Heaven and earth now sing of your glory. Joyfully with voices raised, We exalt you all our days. Great God, Jehovah, you are deserving. Please accept our heartfelt praise.

Damara: Je-ho-va E-lo, sa-du ǃoa-ǂui hâ si-da xa ǃoa-ba-he-sa, ǂha-nu-ai du a xui-ao. Sa-du gā-ai-sib ra mâ-ǂoa-ba da. ǀAm-e ū-hâ ta-ma ǃkhūb.
English: What love Jehovah showed, What goodness from him flowed, When for all mankind he offered his Firstborn. Christ took on human form— The Son of man was born— By his example, God’s name he adorned.

Damara: Sa-du kai ǀkho-ma da ge ra hō-ǃâ. Si-da ǀkha du ge ǁae hâ tsî ǀgo-re-de ra ǁnâu-am. Sa-du kō-ǃgâ da tsî ra ǁkhā-ǁkhā da. Hoa-ǁae du ge ra hui da.
English: Jehovah’s Word, he said, Sustained his life like bread. It gave him wisdom and knowledge and insight. His Father’s willing slave, A model Jesus gave; To please his Father would bring him delight.

Damara: ǃHūb-aib ge sa-du ǂkhai-sib xa ra ǁnae. ǃGâi-a-ǂgaob ǀkha da nî ǁnae tsî ǀams kō-se nî koa du. Je-ho-va E-lo, sa-du ǃoa-ǂui hâ. Si-da xa ǃoa-ba-he-sa.
English: Like Jesus, may our days Provide Jehovah praise, And may his footsteps become our own roadway. Let Jesus’ model be Our path eternally, And then God’s favor we’ll know day by day.

Damara: Nēb ge a-ma ǀnam-ma, Je-ho-vab ge ǁgau-ba. Hoa khoen ǃa-ro-mab ge ǁÎb ǀGôa-ba ge mā. Xris-tub ge ǃgam-ǃgam-sen— Khoen ôab ge ge ǃnae-he— ǁÎb ai-ǁgaus ge, ǃKhūb ǀon-sa ra kai-kai.
English: A multitude is gathering from ev’ry tribe and nation, Collected by the Christ and his anointed congregation. God’s Kingdom has been brought to birth; We pray his will be done on earth. This hope is a gift of priceless worth, Giving joy and consolation. (CHORUS) Praise our God, Jehovah; Praise his Son forever— King of all kings and the Lord of lords. Now unitedly we bow to his rule And praise him with one accord.

Damara: ǁÎb ge ge mî ǃKhūb mîs ge ǂû-i kha-mi ī. Tsî gā-ai-sib tsî ǂans tsî-na ge mā bi. ǁGûb di mā-sen-xa ǃgāb, Xris-tub ge ai-ǁgau-sa mā da tsî nēs ǀkha ǁGû-ba ge ǂkhî-ǂkhî.
English: We praise the Christ, our reigning King, with sounds of jubilation. This Prince of Peace will be our Judge and bring about salvation. We see the joys that lie ahead: An earth released from fear and dread; The time for our Lord to raise the dead. What a time for exultation! (CHORUS) Praise our God, Jehovah; Praise his Son forever— King of all kings and the Lord of lords. Now unitedly we bow to his rule And praise him with one accord.

Damara: A da Je-sub kha-mi Je-ho-va-ba koa re. As ǁîb di ai-ǁgau-sa si-da dao-ǁgau re. A da Je-sub ai-ǁgau-sa tsēs hoa-sa sao re. O da ge Je-ho-va-ba nî ǂkhî-ǂkhî.
English: Praise Jehovah’s Firstborn, God’s duly appointed King. He reigns for truth and justice; Rich blessings his rule will bring. With dignity and splendor And love for God’s great name, He’ll vindicate Jehovah, His sov’reignty proclaim. (CHORUS) Praise Jehovah’s Firstborn! All praise God’s anointed Son. Installed upon Mount Zion, His Kingship has now begun!

Damara: Khoen ge mâ go-wab, ǁae-di tsî ǃhao-di hoa-de xu ǀhao hâ, Je-sub Xris-tub tsî ǂkhau-he-sa ǀhao-hâb xa ǀhao-ǀhao-he hâ. ǃKhūb Gao-sib go ǂgae-ǂgui tsoa-tsoa, ǁîb ǂâi-sas ǃhūb-aib ai hā re. Nē ǃâu-ba-sens kai-se ǂoa-ǂam-sa, Nēs ge ǁkhae-ǂgao-sa ra mā da. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ka-re re E-lo-ba tsî Xris-tub ǁÎb di ǀgôab— ǃKhū-gu di ǃKhūb, gao-ao-gu di Gaob. ǀGui-ǃnâ-xa-sib ǃnâ da nî ǀgo-re-ǀî tsî hoa-ǁae nî ǃoa-ba bi.
English: Praise Jehovah’s Firstborn, Who died so that we may live. He humbly paid the ransom; Our sins God can now forgive. The bride of Christ awaits him, Adorned for him in white. This marriage in the heavens Will prove God’s rule is right. (CHORUS) Praise Jehovah’s Firstborn! All praise God’s anointed Son. Installed upon Mount Zion, His Kingship has now begun!

Damara: Je-sub Xris-tu-ba ǁnae-ba re, si-da di kai gao-ao-ba. Nē gao-aob ge ǃno-ra-sa-sib tsî ǂkhîb tsî-na nî-ra hau. Tsî nē-sa ǃoa da ra mû-ǂui: ǃGom-si-ga xu o-re-he-sa, ǁō hân di khâis di ǃâu-ba-sen-sa. Ma-ti-kō-se nî bu-ru-xaǃ (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ka-re re E-lo-ba tsî Xris-tub ǁÎb di ǀgôab— ǃKhū-gu di ǃKhūb, gao-ao-gu di Gaob. ǀGui-ǃnâ-xa-sib ǃnâ da nî ǀgo-re-ǀî tsî hoa-ǁae nî ǃoa-ba bi.
English: Jehovah anointed his Son To rule over ev’ryone. His throne is established on justice, That God’s will on earth may be done. (CHORUS) Praise Jah for his Son, the Anointed. Praise Jesus, O you faithful sheep, Who loyally follow day after day and all his commandments keep. Praise Jah for his Son, the Anointed, the Ruler of heavenly fame, Anointed with exultation and might to honor God’s holy name.

Damara: Koa re E-lob ǀgôa-ba, ǁîb xa ge ǁhûi-he Gao-ba. ǁÎb a-mab ǃnâ ra ǂgae-ǂgui tsî kai ǀkhae-ba nî ǀkhī-ū. ǃGam ǃgôa-sib tsî ka-res ǀkha ǃKhūb ǀon-sab ǀnam xui-aob ge ǁî-sa ra ǀga-pi kai. ǃKhūb ǂgae-ǂguis ge a ǃgâi. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Koa re E-lob ǀgôa-ba! An hoa-na ǀgôa-ba koa re. Si-ons ǃhom-mi ai mâ-ba. ǁÎb ǂgae-ǂguis ge go tsoa-tsoa!
English: Christ’s brothers are chosen and called. God gives them their own new birth. This bride class will share in the Kingdom And bring Paradise to this earth. (CHORUS) Praise Jah for his Son, the Anointed. Praise Jesus, O you faithful sheep, Who loyally follow day after day and all his commandments keep. Praise Jah for his Son, the Anointed, the Ruler of heavenly fame, Anointed with exultation and might to honor God’s holy name.

Damara: Koa re E-lob ǀgôa-ba, si-da ǃgao ge a ǁō-ba. Xo-re-ma-ri-ba mās ǀkha, si-da ǁō-ren ǃa-ro-ma. ǁÎb ǃgam-e ta-ras ǃâu hâ ǁîs ǃu-ri sa-rab ǃnâ. Nē ǃgae-ǀhaos ǀhom-mi ǃnâ hâs ge ǂgae-ǂgui-sa ra ǁgau (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Koa re E-lob ǀgôa-ba! An hoa-na ǀgôa-ba koa re. Si-ons ǃhom-mi ai mâ-ba. ǁÎb ǂgae-ǂguis ge go tsoa-tsoa!
English: Kind and patient, perfect in love, Was Christ, who came down from above. He took care of our needs With words and by deeds; He gave of his time and his love. He would keep the lowly in mind By healing the sick, deaf, and blind. To his royal commission he proved true And willingly said: “I want to.”

Damara: Je-ho-vab ge ǀGôa-ba ge ǂkhau, îb hoa khoe-na ǂgae-ǂgui ǁkhā. ǁÎb trons ge ǂha-nu-ai-sib ai mâ, is E-lob ǂâi-sa dī-he ǁkhā. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va-ba koa re ǁîb ǀGôab ǃgao, Je-su-ba du hoa do koa re. ǂGom-ǂgom-sa-se ǁÎb mî-sa hoa-ǁae ra saon tsî ǁÎb ǂâi-sa ra dīn. Je-ho-va-ba koa re ǁîb ǀGôab ǃgao, ǁîb Gao-sib di ǂgae-ǂgui-ao-ba. Je-sub ge hoa-ǁae ǁîb di ǁGûb kai ǃa-nu ǀon-sa ra ǀga-pi kai.
English: We now try to follow his way In all of our dealings each day. We are loving and kind To all whom we find; We help them to learn and obey. We respond to friends when in need; We love them in word and in deed. So if widows and orphans should ask you, Then readily say: “I want to.”

Damara: Xris-tub ǃgâ-gu ge ǁhûi-he hâ. ǃKhūb ra ǀa-sa ǃnae-sa mā. ǁÎn ge Gao-si-ba ra ku-ru-ǂui tsî pa-ra-dai-sa nî hau-oa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va-ba koa re ǁîb ǀGôab ǃgao, Je-su-ba du hoa do koa re. ǂGom-ǂgom-sa-se ǁÎb mî-sa hoa-ǁae ra saon tsî ǁÎb ǂâi-sa ra dīn. Je-ho-va-ba koa re ǁîb ǀGôab ǃgao, ǁîb Gao-sib di ǂgae-ǂgui-ao-ba. Je-sub ge hoa-ǁae ǁîb di ǁGûb kai ǃa-nu ǀon-sa ra ǀga-pi kai.
English: Today, Jehovah God, we stand before your throne, For you showed the greatest love that could ever be shown. You gave the gift of your dear Son, that we might live. No greater sacrifice than this could you ever give. (CHORUS) He gave his life to set us free. His precious blood provides the key. With all our hearts, we’ll go on thanking you eternally.

Damara: ǂKhî tsî ǃnū-ǃnâ-xa, ǀnam-mi ǃnâb, Je-su-ba ǀhom-ma xu ge hā. Tsî si-da di ǂhâ-si-ga ge-re kō-ǃgâ. ǁÎb di ǀnam-ma ǁgau das ǃnâ-ūb ge ǀgâ-sa khoen xa ge-re ǂâi. Tsî ǀae hâ-na ge-re ǂgau-ǂgau. ǁÎb ge Gao-sib sî-sen-ga ge-re ǁgau, Mā-sen tsîb ge mî: “ǂGao ta ra.”
English: It was a willing sacrifice that Jesus made. Out of love, his perfect life was the price that he paid. We had no hope until he came to save mankind. But now our hope is finding life, leaving death behind. (CHORUS) He gave his life to set us free. His precious blood provides the key. With all our hearts, we’ll go on thanking you eternally.

Damara: ǁÎb dao-ba da ge ra sao ǂgao, si-da dī-gu ǃnâ tsēs hoa-sa. ǀHao-ū da ra-na ǀnam-mi ǃnâ ra hâ ū. Hui nî da ra în ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sen tsî ǂhâ-sib ra hâ o nî hui. Mîn tsî dī-gu ǀkha da nî ǀnam. ǃOa-ta-ran tsî ǁgû-on ga ǂgan o du, mā-sen-xa-se mî: “ǂGao ta ra.”
English: Jehovah, our Father in heaven, Oh, this is a most sacred night! It was then, long ago, you determined to show Your love, justice, wisdom, and might. The Passover lamb gave protection, And your favored people were freed. Cent’ries later our Lord his own lifeblood outpoured To fulfill this divine prophecy.

Damara: Je-ho-va E-lob trons, ai-ǃâ da ge go hā. Sa-du di kai ǀnam-mi si-da ǃoa du go ǁgaub ǃgao. ǀGôa-ba du ge ǀkhaeb a-se si-da ǃoa ge sî, î da ǀam-o ûi-ba hō-ǁkhā. Nē ǀkhaeb ge ǀga-pi. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǁÎb ge ǁîb ûi-ba ge a mā. Î da si-da o-re-sa hō. Si-da ǂgaob ǃgam-si-ba xu, da ge hoa-ǁae nî gan-gan.
English: The bread and the wine are reminders, How great is the price that you paid. And the good that was done through the gift of your Son, In life and in death he obeyed. We gratefully keep this Memorial; This night is a time to recall How the death of your Son paid the ransom that won The redemption from death for us all.

Damara: Mā-sen-xa-seb ge Je-su-ba ge mā-ǁnâ-sen. ǁÎb di ǀoa-sa ûi-bab ge si-da ǃgao ge a mā. ǃÂu-ba-sen-e da ge ge ū-hâ ta-ma i, o-re dab ge hās kō-se. Ûi-ba da ge go hō. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǁÎb ge ǁîb ûi-ba ge a mā. Î da si-da o-re-sa hō. Si-da ǂgaob ǃgam-si-ba xu, da ge hoa-ǁae nî gan-gan.
English: We’re gathered together before you. At your invitation we’ve come To give praise for your love that brought Christ from above And honor to you and your Son. The Lord’s Ev’ning Meal brings you glory And strengthens our heart and our mind. So we’ll walk ev’ry day as Christ showed us the way, And then life everlasting we’ll find.

Damara: Je-ho-va, hoan xa ǀga-pi E-lob, nēs ge ǃa-nu ǃnō-sa ǃui-sa! ǁNā ǃui du ge hoa khoe-na ge ǁgau sa-du a, ǀnam-mi tsî gā-ai-sib ǃKhū-sa. Pas-xab di ǁkhaob ge ǂhai ǁnā tsēs ai tsî du ge ǁae-e a ǁgau-mâi. Ku-ri-gu khao-ǃgâb ge Je-su-ba ge a ǁō, nē kē-bos nî dī-ǀoa-ǀoa-he-se.
English: Jehovah, dear Father, There seemed no hope for us. The ransom has given Hope to ev’ryone! We give our lives to you, Our best in all we do. And we’ll tell others too, That your will might be done. (CHORUS) You gave your precious Son, And now we sing as one, A song we’ll sing forever, for giving us your precious Son.

Damara: Xûi-i tsî pe-reb ge ra ǁgau da, nē ǀkhaeb ge kai-se ǃgom-ǀgau-sa. Tsî nēs ge Sa-du ǀgôab xa ge ī-ǁkhā kai-he. ǁŌb kō-seb ge ge a ǁnâu-ǀnam. Nēs xa da ge hoa-ǁae ra ǂâi ǂgao. Nē ǃuis xa da ǀu-ru ti-de, Sa-du ǀgôab mā-sen-xa-se a mā-ǁnâ-sen o ǁo-re-ba xu ǃno-ra kai das ǃgao.
English: Your kindness, your mercy, They draw us close to you. Your great name, your friendship, These we’ve come to love. But something more than this Is your most precious gift. He died that we might live. You sent him from above. (CHORUS) You gave your precious Son, And now we sing as one, A song we’ll sing forever, for giving us your precious Son.  (ENDING) Jehovah, dear Father, we pray in gratitude. We offer our thanks for giving us your precious Son.

Damara: Sa-du ai-ǃâ da ge go a ǀhao. Sa-du ǁkhau da hâ ǃkhais ǃgao o, î da gan-gan du Je-sub Xris-tub ǃa-ro-ma. Nēs ǃgao da ge ra gan-gan du, nē tsēs sa-du ǂkhai-si-ba ra ǁgau tsîs ge nē-sa ra ǀgai-ǀgai da. Xris-tub ge ǁgau da dao-ba da ge ra sao ǂgao, ǀam-o ûi-ba da nî hō-ǁkhā-se.
English: Something precious to Jehovah, Bringing him such keen delight, Is his Kingdom by Christ Jesus, Which will set all matters right. (CHORUS) Keep on seeking first the Kingdom And Jehovah’s righteousness. Sing his praise among the nations, Serving him in faithfulness.

Damara: Je-ho-va, si-da ǁGû, ǁkhā-sib ge ge ǀkhai-i. Xa-web ge xo-re-ma-ri-ba ge hui da! Si-da ûi-ba ra mā tsî ǁkhā da an hoa-na. Tsî khoe-na ra mî-ba, Sa-du di ǀnam-mi xa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǀGôa-ba du ge ge mā. ǀGui-ba da ra ǁnae-ǀhao, ǀa-sa ǁnae-tsa-na-sa tsî Sa-du ǀgôab ǃgao ra ai-o du.
English: Why be anxious for tomorrow, ‘Will we hunger, will we thirst?’ For our God will make provision If we seek his Kingdom first. (CHORUS) Keep on seeking first the Kingdom And Jehovah’s righteousness. Sing his praise among the nations, Serving him in faithfulness.

Damara: Khoe-xa-sib tsî ǀnam-mi, Sa-du ǃoa ra ǂgae da. Sa-du ǀons tsî ǃgâi-sib, nēn a ǀō-ai-sa. Xa-we nēn xa ǀga-pi î ge Sa-du ǀkhae-ba. Sa-du ǀgôab ge ge ǁō, î da ûi-ba hō-ǁkhā. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǀGôa-ba du ge ge mā. ǀGui-ba da ra ǁnae-ǀhao, ǀa-sa ǁnae-tsa-na-sa tsî Sa-du ǀgôab ǃgao ra ai-o du.  (ǀUNIS) Je-ho-va, si-da ǁgû, ǂkhîb ǀkha da ra ǀgo-re. Kai-se ra ai-o du, sa-du di ǀgôab ǃa-ro-ma.
English: So declare the Kingdom good news; Help deserving ones to see That their hope is in Jehovah And in his Theocracy. (CHORUS) Keep on seeking first the Kingdom And Jehovah’s righteousness. Sing his praise among the nations, Serving him in faithfulness.

Damara: ǀGa-pi xū-i E-lo-ba xu kai ǂkhî-ba ra mā da i ge Xris-tub di ǂgae-ǂgui-sa o, xū-na nî-ra ǃgâi-ǃgâi-sa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǂGu-ro-se Gao-sib tsî ǁîb di ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba ôa re. ǁNae re ǁîb xa hoa ǃhao-di ǃnâ tsî ǂgao-ba xu ǃoa-ba re.
English: God’s Kingdom rules from above. All praise his Son, the beloved. Christ reigns in Zion, the chief cornerstone. Let us all lift up our voice. Sing to our God, and rejoice. Christ, Lord and Savior, has been placed upon His throne. (CHORUS) What will you bring, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Triumph of truth and righteousness. And bring what else, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Eternal life and happiness. Praise the Universal Sov’reign For his love and faithfulness.

Damara: Tā ǂhan-sen re hā-nî tsēs xa. ǁGâ tsî da ga ǃâ xa-web ge E-lo-ba nî kō-ǃgâ da. Gao-si-ba da ga ôa o. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǂGu-ro-se Gao-sib tsî ǁîb di ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba ôa re. ǁNae re ǁîb xa hoa ǃhao-di ǃnâ tsî ǂgao-ba xu ǃoa-ba re.
English: Christ now in power is here, And Armageddon is near. Satan’s old system will soon pass away. Now is the season to preach. Many there are yet to reach; Time for the meek to take their stand for Him today. (CHORUS) What will you bring, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Triumph of truth and righteousness. And bring what else, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Eternal life and happiness. Praise the Universal Sov’reign For his love and faithfulness.

Damara: ǁNā-a-ma-ga ǃgâi-ǂhôa-sa ǂhôa, în ǃoa-ǂui ra-na mû-ǂan, ǁîn ǃâu-ba-sens ǃKhūb ǃnâ hâ-sa. Tsî Je-ho-vab ǂgae-ǂguis ǃnâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǂGu-ro-se Gao-sib tsî ǁîb di ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba ôa re. ǁNae re ǁîb xa hoa ǃhao-di ǃnâ tsî ǂgao-ba xu ǃoa-ba re.
English: God’s reigning Ruler we prize. Wondrous he is in our eyes. He comes in God’s name; we bow to our King. Enter the grand temple gate; God’s favor now supplicate. Soon dawns that day when he rules over ev’rything. (CHORUS) What will you bring, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Triumph of truth and righteousness. And bring what else, Jehovah’s Kingdom? Eternal life and happiness. Praise the Universal Sov’reign For his love and faithfulness.

Damara: E-lob Gao-sib ra ǂgae-ǂgui. Tsî ǁÎb di ǀGôa-ba koa re. Tsî Xris-tub ge ǀhom-mi ǃnâ ra ǂgae-ǂgui. A da ǃga-ri dom-mi ǀkha, si-da E-lo-ba ǁnae-ba. Je-sub Xris-tub, o-re-aob ge trons ai go ǂnû. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lob Gao-si-ba tae-e nî dī? ǁÎb ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba nî hau. Tsî tae-na nî-ra dī, Gao-si-ba? ǁÎb ǀam-o ûi-ba nî mā da. Hoan xa ǀga-pi E-lo-ba koa, ǁîb ǂgom-ǃgâ-sib ǃa-ro-ma.
English: Raise your eyes up and see, Far above the highest hill. There stands Jehovah’s mountain Lifted up in this day. People come from afar, Ev’rywhere from sea to sea, Calling to one another, ‘Come serve God and obey.’ Now the time has arrived For the small, a great nation to be. As we grow and we thrive, God’s direction and blessing we see. Millions now come to God And accept his sov’reignty. Loyal they vow to be And from his side never stray.

Damara: Xris-tub ge ra ǂgae-ǂgui tsî Ar-ma-ge-dons ge go ǀgū. ǁGâu-ab ǃhūb-aib ge ǀae nî ū-bē-he. Nēb ge ǁaeb ao-ǁnâs di-ba. ǂGuin ge hâ hui da nî na, tsam-tsi-ǃnân ge nē-si E-lob ǀkhāb ai nî mâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lob Gao-si-ba tae-e nî dī? ǁÎb ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba nî hau. Tsî tae-na nî-ra dī, Gao-si-ba? ǁÎb ǀam-o ûi-ba nî mā da. Hoan xa ǀga-pi E-lo-ba koa, ǁîb ǂgom-ǃgâ-sib ǃa-ro-ma.
English: Jesus gave the command To go forth and preach the word. Good news about the Kingdom Reaches all men today. Christ now rules from above, Urging all to take his side. Meek ones who hear his voice Let God’s Word show them the way. It brings joy to the heart, As the great crowd continues to grow. And we all have a part, As we strive to let ev’ryone know. Let us lift up the voice, Calling out for all to hear, ‘Come to Jehovah’s mountain, Here forever to stay.’

Damara: E-lob ǀgôa-ba da ra koa. Si-da mû-ǁaeb kai-se kai. ǃKhūb ǀons ǃnâb ra hā, ǁîb ai-ǃâ ǃhon re. ǁÎb di tem-pe-li ǃnâ ǂgâ tsî E-lob ǃgâi-ba ôa re. Tsēs ge go ǀgū, hoa xūn ǂam-aib nî ǂgae-ǂgui-sa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lob Gao-si-ba tae-e nî dī? ǁÎb ǂha-nu-ai-si-ba nî hau. Tsî tae-na nî-ra dī, Gao-si-ba? ǁÎb ǀam-o ûi-ba nî mā da. Hoan xa ǀga-pi E-lo-ba koa, ǁîb ǂgom-ǃgâ-sib ǃa-ro-ma.
English: Other sheep Jesus has, and they serve alongside those anointed to be Christ’s heavenly bride. All the things that are done for their comfort and aid Are things he considers that must be repaid. (CHORUS) “If you comforted them, you comforted me. If you did it for them, you did it for me. Your labors for them were your labors for me. You did it for them; you did it for me. If you did it for them, you did it for me.”

Damara: Kō khâi ǀga-pi-ga kō, ǃhom-gu ǀga-pi-ga ǃnū-se. ǁNāb ge E-lob ǃhom-ma mâ, nē-tsē ǀga-pi-se mâ. Khoen ǃnū-se-ba xu hâ, hu-ri-ba xu hu-rib ǃoa. Mâ-i hoa-i ge ra ǂgai, ‘hā re î da ǃgâ bi.’ Nēb ge E-lob ǁae-ba ǂkha-ri-ron ge nî-ra kai ǁae kai. ǂGui da ra ǀgaub ai o, ǃKhūb dao-ǁgaus tsî ǀkhae-ba da ra mû. ǂGuin ge ǃKhūb ǃoa ra hā tsî ǂgae-ǂgui-sa ra ū-ǃoa. ǂHau-ǃnâ-se da nî hâ tsî ǁî-ba xu bē ti-de.
English: “Yes, you comforted me in my hunger and thirst, and whatever my need, you came to me first.” “Tell us, when did we do this?” these ones will reply. The King will then answer them, telling them why: (CHORUS) “If you comforted them, you comforted me. If you did it for them, you did it for me. Your labors for them were your labors for me. You did it for them; you did it for me. If you did it for them, you did it for me.”

Damara: Je-sub ge ge mî-mā î da ǁîb mîs xa ao-ǁnâ. ǃGâi-ǂhôas Gao-sib di-sa o khoen ra ǁnâu-sa nē-tsē. Xris-tub ge ra ǂgae-ǂgui, an hoa-na ǁîb ǀkhāb ai mâ. Khoen ǁî-ba ra ǃgâ-na E-lob-mîs xa dao-ǁgau-he. Si-da ǂgaob ge ra dâ. Kai ǂnu-bis khoen ra ǂgui kha-mi da ge hoa da ǁîn di ǃâ. Hoa khoe-na da ǁîb xa ra ǂan kai. A da ǃga-ri dom-mi, ǀkha ǂgai re în hoa-na ǁnâu ‘hā re E-lob ǃhom-mi ǃoa, tsî ǀam-o-se hâ-hâ.’
English: “You’ve been loyal to me, doing works that are fine, as you preach alongside these brothers of mine.” So the King will then say to the sheep on his right: “Inherit the earth and perfection of life.” (CHORUS) “If you comforted them, you comforted me. If you did it for them, you did it for me. Your labors for them were your labors for me. You did it for them; you did it for me. If you did it for them, you did it for me.”

Damara: E-lob ti ǀa-sa ku-rus, ǁÎb ti ǂkhau-he-sa ǀgôa-gu. Khoe-na xub ge a ǁhûi-na, ǁÎb di ǀkhae-ban ū-hâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǀŌ-ai-sa ǁhûi-ǂui-san, ǁÎb ǀon-sa ta-ni hâ khoen. ǁÎn ǀnam du tsî koa du. ǁÎn ge ǀgui-ba mâ-ǀhao tsî ra ǁnae.
English: The time is near when God reveals His faithful chosen ones. In heaven they will rule with Christ As mighty spirit sons. (CHORUS) The sons of God will be revealed Along with Christ, their Lord. They’ll join him in his victory And share in his reward.

Damara: Nēs ge a ǃa-nu ǁae-sa, a-ma-ba ra ū-ba-sen. ǃKhae-na-ba xun ge ǂgai-he ǁÎb bu-ru-xa ǃnâb ǃoa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǀŌ-ai-sa ǁhûi-ǂui-san, ǁÎb ǀon-sa ta-ni hâ khoen. ǁÎn ǀnam du tsî koa du. ǁÎn ge ǀgui-ba mâ-ǀhao tsî ra ǁnae.
English: And soon the last remaining ones Will hear his final call. The King of kings and Lord of lords Will then collect them all. (CHORUS) The sons of God will be revealed Along with Christ, their Lord. They’ll join him in his victory And share in his reward.  (BRIDGE) And then with Christ, these sons of God Will wage the final war. The joyous marriage to the Lamb Will last forevermore.  (CHORUS) The sons of God will be revealed Along with Christ, their Lord. They’ll join him in his victory And share in his reward.

Damara: ǀÛ ta-ma-sen ra ao-ǁnâ, nau gū-na ra ǀhao-ǀhao-se. ǁKhaob ǃoa-ain ge ǂgom-ǂgom-sa, ǁîb mî-den ra dī-se. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǀŌ-ai-sa ǁhûi-ǂui-san, ǁÎb ǀon-sa ta-ni hâ khoen. ǁÎn ǀnam du tsî koa du. ǁÎn ge ǀgui-ba mâ-ǀhao tsî ra ǁnae.
English: Who is your friend, O God? Who in your tent may dwell? Who gains your friendship? Who gains your trust? Who really knows you well? All who embrace your Word, All who have faith in you, All who are loyal, all who are just, Living the truth for you.

Damara: Nau gūn ge Je-sub ǀkha, ǀgui-ba ra sî-sen-ǀhao. Tsî ǂkhau-he-sa E-lob ǀgôa-ga ǀhom-mi ǃnâ. Hoa xūn ge nî dī-he, ǁîn ǁkhae-ǂgaos tsî huib ǃgao. Nēn ge xūn hî-nab ra ǂâi-ǃgâ-na hoa-ǁae. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) “ǁÎ-na du ra hui o, o du ra hui te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te. ǁÎn ra hō-ǃâ tsû-ba du ra hō-ǃâ o. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du ǀnam te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te.”
English: Who is your friend, O God? Who may approach your throne? Who brings delight and makes you rejoice? Whose name to you is known? All who exalt your name, All who your Word obey, All who are faithful, honest in heart, Truthful in all they say.

Damara: “Ti-ta du ge a hui, ti ǃâs tsî ǁgâs tsîn ǃnâ tsî du ge ǂhâ-ba da hân hoa-na mā te.” “Mâ-ǁae ta ge nē-na dī?” Din ǀnî-na nî mî. Ob ge Gao-ao-ba ǃe-re-am tsî nî mî: (ǁNAEǀHAOS) “ǁÎ-na du ra hui o, o du ra hui te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te. ǁÎn ra hō-ǃâ tsû-ba du ra hō-ǃâ o. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du ǀnam te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te.”
English: Throwing our cares on you, Baring our hearts in prayer, Drawing us closer, bonding in love, Feeling your daily care, We yearn to be your friend. Long may our friendship grow. No greater Friend could we ever gain, No greater Friend we’ll know.

Damara: “ǂHau-ǃnâ-se du ti-ta ǀkha ge-re sî-sen-ǀhao, ti ǃgâ-sa-gu ǀkha du ǀgui-ba ra sî-sen.” Ob ge Gao-ba nau gūn, ǃoa nē-ti ge a mî: “ǃHūb-aib tsî ǀoa-sa ûib tsî-na ǀu-mi re.” (ǁNAEǀHAOS) “ǁÎ-na du ra hui o, o du ra hui te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te. ǁÎn ra hō-ǃâ tsû-ba du ra hō-ǃâ o. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du ǀnam te. ǁÎ-na du a ǀnam kha-mi du a ǀnam te.”
English: Glorious Jehovah, almighty, eternal, Perfect in justice, in power, in love. Source of all truth and of infinite wisdom, You rule as Sov’reign in heaven above. We as your people delight in your service; Your Kingdom truth we delight to proclaim. (CHORUS) Being your Witnesses, great is our priv’lege. Oh, may we ever live up to our name!

Damara: Ham-e E-lob ǀhō-sa? ǁÎb oms ǃnâ nî hâ-e? Ham-e sa-du ǂgom-ǂgom-sa ǀhō-sa? Ham-e sa-do a ǂan? Sa-du mî-sa ǀnam-an, sa-du ǃnâ ra ǂgom-an, ǂGom-ǂgom-san tsî ǂha-nu-ain hoan ge, a-ma-ba ra ûi-ǂui.
English: Working together in your sacred service Binds us as brothers in love and in peace. Teaching the truth and reflecting your glory Fill us with joy as your praises increase. Known by your name, O Jehovah, our Father, We have the honor to add to your fame. (CHORUS) Being your Witnesses, great is our priv’lege. Oh, may we ever live up to our name!

Damara: Ham-e E-lob ǀhō-sa? ǃKhūb tron-sa ǀgū ǁkhā-e? Ham-e sa-do kai-se ra ǂkhî kai? ǁÎ-i ǀon-sa du ǂan? Sa-du ǀon-sa ra ǃgôan, Sa-du mî-sa ra ǃgân, ǁNān hî-na a ǂgom-ǂgom-san, ǂgaob ǃnâ tsî a-ma-ba ra ǃhoan.
English: Once with confusion our sad hearts were filled, Drinking the cup false religion distilled; But with what happiness our hearts were thrilled When of God’s Kingdom we heard. (CHORUS) Take sides with Jehovah; Make him your delight. He’ll never forsake you; Walk on in his light. Tell, tell the glad tidings Of freedom and peace. His rule by Christ Jesus Will ever increase.

Damara: Tsû-ba da ra mā du, ǀgo-res ǃnâ-ū E-lo. ǁNās ge ra si-da ǀgū kai sa-du ǀnam-mi tsî kō-ǃgâs ǃnâ. Sa-du ǀhō ǂgao da ra. As nē-sa hâ-hâ re. ǀNî hâ ǀhō-sa-e da ge hō ǁoa, ǀnî hâ-e da a ǀū.
English: Shoulder to shoulder we stand on God’s side, Preaching the news of his Kingdom earth wide. Now is the time for each one to decide, Time to take sides with our God. (CHORUS) Take sides with Jehovah; Make him your delight. He’ll never forsake you; Walk on in his light. Tell, tell the glad tidings Of freedom and peace. His rule by Christ Jesus Will ever increase.

Damara: Bu-ru-xa E-lob koa-he-sa a-nu hâb, ǀoa-sa ǂha-nu-ai-sib tsî ǀnam-mi ǃnâ. ǁÎb ge a-mab tsî gā-ai-sib di tsoa-tsoa, ǁÎb ǀhom-mi ǃnâ gao-ao-se ra ǂgae-ǂgui. ǁÎ-ba ǃoa-bas ge si-da ǂkhî-ba ra mā tsî ǁîb gao-si-ba ǂkhîb ǀkha ra ao-ǁnâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Sa-do ǃoa-bas ge a kai ai-ǂha-nu tsî Sa-du ǀons ǃoa-gu ûis ge kai-se ǃgâi.
English: We will not fear what the Devil can do. Trusting Jehovah will carry us through. Though they are many and though we are few, God is our strength and our might. (CHORUS) Take sides with Jehovah; Make him your delight. He’ll never forsake you; Walk on in his light. Tell, tell the glad tidings Of freedom and peace. His rule by Christ Jesus Will ever increase.

Damara: ǃKhūb ǃoa-bas ǃnâ da ra ǀgui-ba sî-sen ǃkhais ge ǂkhîb tsî ǀnam-mi ǃnâ ra ǀhao-ǀhao da. Sa-du a-ma-ba da ra ǁkhā-ǁkhā tsî ǁgau. ǂKhî-ba mā da re î da sa-do koa. Sa-du ǀons ai da ge ǂan-e Je-ho-va, sa-du ǃgôa-si-ba da ge ra ǂan-ǂan. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Sa-do ǃoa-bas ge a kai ai-ǂha-nu tsî Sa-du ǀons ǃoa-gu ûis ge kai-se ǃgâi.
English: “Listen to my prayer,” Jehovah. Let yourself be found by me. Feel the anguish deep inside me; Help me unafraid to be. (CHORUS) Throw your burden on Jehovah; Trust in him to sustain and save you. He will always give protection. He is loyal; he is true.

Damara: Ûib ge nē ǃhūb-aib ǃnâ ǃgom. Nē ǃhūb-aib ge ǁgam-ro-na ra hau. Xa-we ta nē-ti ra mî, ti ûib ge ǁau ta-ma. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃKhūb ǂha-nu-o-ǃnâ ta-ma, ti ǀnam-mi xab ra ǁaeb hoa-ba ǂâi. ǁÎb ti ǀgū-se hoa-ǁae hâ; E-lob o-se ta hâ ta-ma. E-lob ge ti mû-ǂam-ao tsî ti-ta ǀu-nis kō-se nî sâu. Je-ho-vab ge ti ǁgû tsî ti ǃgâi ǀhō-sa-ba.
English: Had I wings just as a dove has, Far from danger I would fly, Safe from those who seek to hurt me, Sheltered from their hateful cry. (CHORUS) Throw your burden on Jehovah; Trust in him to sustain and save you. He will always give protection. He is loyal; he is true.

Damara: ǂKham-sis tsē-di go ǃgû ī, tsū-kē-ǃgâb di tsē-di ge go hā. Xa-we ta ǂgom-sa ra ǁgau tsî hā-nî-ǁaeb ge ǃgâi. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃKhūb ǂha-nu-o-ǃnâ ta-ma, ti ǀnam-mi xab ra ǁaeb hoa-ba ǂâi. ǁÎb ti ǀgū-se hoa-ǁae hâ; E-lob o-se ta hâ ta-ma. E-lob ge ti mû-ǂam-ao tsî ti-ta ǀu-nis kō-se nî sâu. Je-ho-vab ge ti ǁgû tsî ti ǃgâi ǀhō-sa-ba.
English: Comfort from our God, Jehovah, Always brings us peace of mind. He will help us bear our burden. He is loving; he is kind. (CHORUS) Throw your burden on Jehovah; Trust in him to sustain and save you. He will always give protection. He is loyal; he is true.

Damara: E-lob ǀkha !gû ǃgam-ǃgam-sens ǃnâ, ǂgom-ǂgom-sa ǀnam-ma ǁgaus ǀkha. A da E-lob ǀkha ǃgû ǂgom-ǃgâ-sa-se tsî ab ǁî-ba ǀgai-ǀgai da. Î da ǁîb di mî-sa ǃkhō ǀga-ra, tsē-sa xu tsēs kō-se. Ab Je-ho-va-ba ǂgae-ǂgui da, ǁî-ba ǁnâu-ǀnams ǃnâ-ū o.
English: Please judge me, Lord, observe my loyalty; Observe my trust in you and my integrity. Examine me, and put me to the test; My mind and heart refine, that my soul might be blessed. (CHORUS) But as for me, Determined I will be to walk eternally In my integrity.

Damara: E-lob ǀkha ǂnao-o-ǃnâ-se ǃgû. Hā da ǃa-nu xūn xa ǂâi. Nē-si da ga ra ǃâi-tsâ-he xa-web ge ǁî-ba nî ǀgai-ǀgai da. Tsî mâ koa-he-sa a-nu hâ xūn tsî mâ a-ma-ain hoan, Ai-ǃgû re nēn xa ǂâi-ǃgâ-sa. E-lob sa-da ǀkha nî hâ.
English: I do not sit with wicked men of lies. I hate the company of those who truth despise. Jehovah, please, don’t take away my life With men who take delight in bribery and strife. (CHORUS) But as for me, Determined I will be to walk eternally In my integrity.

Damara: E-lob ǀkha ǃgû ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se, ǁÎb si-da ǀhō a-ma-ga. ǁÎb ǀkhae-ba ǃgôa-si-ba ū-hâ-ba re. E-lob ǀkhaeb ge nî hâ-hâ. E-lob ǀkha ǃgû i ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re, ǁnaes ǃnâ-ū ǁgâi-ǂui-sen. Kai ǃgâi-a-ǂgaob ge hō-e ǁkhā, E-lob a sa ǀhō-sa o.
English: For I have loved the dwelling of your house. Your worship, oh, so pure, I daily will espouse. And I will march around your altar grand, To make thanksgiving heard aloud throughout the land. (CHORUS) But as for me, Determined I will be to walk eternally In my integrity.

Damara: Si-da ǂgaob ge tsûb tsî ǃoab xa ǀoa hâ. A-ma ta-ma ǂgoms ǃnâ da ge hâ i, xa-web ge si-da ǂgao-ga ge ǂkhî ǃKhūb, Gao-sib xa da ge ǁnâu o. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-vab ǀkhāb ai mâ, ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se hâ. ǁÎb ge tā-tsēs tsî-na ǁnā-xū da ti-de. Mî-ba khoe-na ǂkhîb tsî ǃno-ra-sa-sib xa. Je-sub ǂgae-ǂguis ge ǀams kō-se nî hâ-hâ.
English: We guard our hearts, it means our life; We shun the path of sin. God reads the heart, and there he finds The person deep within. Sometimes the heart deceives the mind, And we begin to stray. So may our mind direct our heart And keep Jehovah’s way.

Damara: Xa-we da ǀgui-ba E-lob ǀkhāb ai mâ tsî ǁîb Gao-sib ǃgâi-ǂhôa-sa ra ao-ǁnâ. Nēb ge ǁaeb mâ-i hoa-i nî ǁhûi-ba, Je-ho-vab ǀkhāb ai mâ-sa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-vab ǀkhāb ai mâ, ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se hâ. ǁÎb ge tā-tsēs tsî-na ǁnā-xū da ti-de. Mî-ba khoe-na ǂkhîb tsî ǃno-ra-sa-sib xa. Je-sub ǂgae-ǂguis ge ǀams kō-se nî hâ-hâ.
English: Prepared in heart, we search for God By means of earnest prayer. Each day we give him praise and thanks, Revealing ev’ry care. The things Jehovah teaches us, We gladly will obey. We cultivate a loyal heart, To please him ev’ry day.

Damara: Si-da ge ǁgâu-ab dī-ga ǃao ti-de. Je-ho-vab ai da ge ra ǂgom-ai-ǂnûi. ǁÎn ga ǂgui tsî si-da ǀo-ro xa-we, E-lob ge si-da di ǀgai. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-vab ǀkhāb ai mâ, ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se hâ. ǁÎb ge tā-tsēs tsî-na ǁnā-xū da ti-de. Mî-ba khoe-na ǂkhîb tsî ǃno-ra-sa-sib xa. Je-sub ǂgae-ǂguis ge ǀams kō-se nî hâ-hâ.
English: Our hearts we shield from harmful thoughts, We dwell on what is true. We love God’s Word to touch our hearts, To strengthen and renew. Jehovah loves his loyal ones; On this we can depend. We’ll worship him wholeheartedly Forever as his friend.

Damara: ‘Ti ǀkho-ma-sa ǃgâ re E-lo’. Î ta sa-do hō-ǁkhā o. Ti tsû-ba tsâ re ti-ta ǃnâ; î hui te î ta tā ǃao. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGom-si-ga da ǃKhūb ǃom-ǁae mā; îb Je-ho-va-ba kō-ǃgâ da re. Mâ-ǁaeb hoa-ba nî ǁkhau-ba da. ǁÎb ǂgom-ǂgom-sa tsî a-ma.
English: O Jehovah, Sov’reign Ruler, You are the one I love and obey. You deserve my full devotion; You are my God; I’ll serve you each day. Your commands I loyally follow; How I love reminders from you! (CHORUS) O Jehovah, you are worthy; Whole-souled devotion I give to you.

Damara: ǁGa-bo-kha ta ga ū-hâ o, o ta ga ǁhā-na-bē hâ, ǃnū-se tsū-dī te ra-na xu tsî ǁîn di ǁaib tsî-na xu. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGom-si-ga da ǃKhūb ǃom-ǁae mā; îb Je-ho-va-ba kō-ǃgâ da re. Mâ-ǁaeb hoa-ba nî ǁkhau-ba da. ǁÎb ǂgom-ǂgom-sa tsî a-ma.
English: Father, all your works exalt you. Earth, moon, and stars your glory proclaim. May I also be as faithful, Using my strength to make known your name. May I use my whole life to serve you, Proving to be loyal and true. (CHORUS) O Jehovah, you are worthy; Whole-souled devotion I give to you.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ge nî ǁkhae-ǂgao da tsî ǃgâi ǂâi-sa nî mā da. ǁÎb ge ǃgom-sin ǀkha nî hui da. ǁÎb a ǀnam-xa-ǃnâ xui-ao. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGom-si-ga da ǃKhūb ǃom-ǁae mā; îb Je-ho-va-ba kō-ǃgâ da re. Mâ-ǁaeb hoa-ba nî ǁkhau-ba da. ǁÎb ǂgom-ǂgom-sa tsî a-ma.
English: There was a reason why God brought the truth to you And called you from the darkness to the light. Within your heart, he saw the longing that you had To search for him and practice what is right. You promised him in prayer to do his will; He helped you then, and he will help you still. (CHORUS) With Jesus’ blood He bought you, to God you now belong. So he will make you firm, and he will make you strong. He’ll guide you and protect you, as he has all along. Yes, he will make you firm, and he will make you strong.

Damara: Ôa-ǃnâ te re, ti ǃgâi-ba kō ti ǃKhū, ti ǂgom-ǃgâ-sib tsî ǂhau-ǃnâ-sib tsî-na kō re. Ôa-ǃnâ te tsî hoa-ǁae ǃâi-tsâ te re. Ti ǂgao-ba ǃa-nu, î ǀkhae te re ti E-lo. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Î ta hoa-ǁae mâ-ǁa-po ǁkhā ti ǃKhū, î ta ǀam-o-sib kō-se ǂhau-ǃnâ-se ǃgû ǁkhā.
English: God gave his own beloved Son in your behalf; On this account, He wants you to succeed. If He did not withhold the gift of His dear Son, Then never doubt He’ll give the strength you need. He won’t forget the faith and love you’ve shown; He will not fail to care for all His own. (CHORUS) With Jesus’ blood He bought you, to God you now belong. So he will make you firm, and he will make you strong. He’ll guide you and protect you, as he has all along. Yes, he will make you firm, and he will make you strong.

Damara: ǂHu-mi-aon ǀkha ta ge ǂnû ta-ma hâ. A-ma-ba ǃgâ ta-man ǀkha hâ-sa ta ǃhui hâ. Je-ho-va ti ûi-ba tā ū-bē re, ǂha-nu-o-ǃnâ-sib ǃnâ ra ǃgâi-ǃgâi-sen khoen ǀkha. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Î ta hoa-ǁae mâ-ǁa-po ǁkhā ti ǃKhū, î ta ǀam-o-sib kō-se ǂhau-ǃnâ-se ǃgû ǁkhā.
English: Throughout our lifetime, We want to use each day To make a good name And all God’s laws obey. If in Jehovah’s sight We strive to do what’s right, Then we will please him, To his delight.

Damara: Sa-du om-mi ǃnâ hâs ge ǃgâi-ba te. Sa-du ǃoa-ba-sa ta ge hoa-ǁae nî ǂkhâ-ǃnâ. Sa-du al-tars ǂna-mi-pe ta nî ǃgû, gan-gan-xa-si-ba ta ǃhūb-aib hoab ǃnâ nî ǁgau. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Î ta hoa-ǁae mâ-ǁa-po ǁkhā ti ǃKhū, î ta ǀam-o-sib kō-se ǂhau-ǃnâ-se ǃgû ǁkhā.
English: This world may cause us To try to make a name, To seek its favor, To bask in its acclaim. But that is vanity, For if its friend we’ll be, Jehovah’s favor, We will not see.

Damara: ǀGo-ra-sa nē-tsē dīs ge kai-se ǃgâi tsî a-ma xū-na ǂan-sa tsî kai-se a ǂhâ-ǂhâ-sa xū-na ǂans tsî mâ xū-na da nî dīs. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGâi-ba ǀnam re, ǁgai-ba ǃhui re. ǃKhū-ba ǂkhî kai, ǀkhae-ba da ge nî-ra hō, ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sen tsî da ga ra ǂhâ-ǂhâ-sa xūn ǁae-gu mû-ǃā o.
English: In God’s remembrance, We want our name to be And have a good name For all eternity. On him we can depend, So we his truth defend And keep our good name Down to the end.

Damara: Tae-e kai-se a ǂhâ-ǂhâ-sa-ba da? ǃGâi-ǂhôa-sa khoe-na mî-bas tsî a-ma-ba ra ǂhâ-ba-na ôas, în E-lob dao-ba ǁhûi-ba-sen. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGâi-ba ǀnam re, ǁgai-ba ǃhui re. ǃKhū-ba ǂkhî kai, ǀkhae-ba da ge nî-ra hō, ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sen tsî da ga ra ǂhâ-ǂhâ-sa xūn ǁae-gu mû-ǃā o.
English: To whom do you belong? Which god do you now obey? Your master’s the one to whom you bow. He is your god; you serve him now. You cannot serve two gods; Devotion cannot be shared. And so in the end your choice will depend On how your heart is prepared.

Damara: ǂHâ-ǂhâ-san ǀkha da ga ǁae-ǁae-sen o, o da ge ǂkhî-ba nî hō. ǁNâu-ǃāb hoa-ba ǃnā hâ ǂkhîb ge si-da ǂgaob tsî ǂâis tsî-na nî sâu. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGâi-ba ǀnam re, ǁgai-ba ǃhui re. ǃKhū-ba ǂkhî kai, ǀkhae-ba da ge nî-ra hō, ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sen tsî da ga ra ǂhâ-ǂhâ-sa xūn ǁae-gu mû-ǃā o.
English: To whom do you belong? Which god will you now obey? For one god is false and one is true, So make your choice; it’s up to you. Will Caesar of this world Possess your allegiance still? Or will you obey the true God today By always doing his will?

Damara: Si-da ǂgao-ga da ra ǁkhau-ba î da tā ǁo-re-ga. E-lob ge ǂgao-gu hoa-ga ǂan, ǁîb hoa-se a ǂan da. ǂGaob ge khoe-e gā-xa-ǃnâ ǁkhā tsî da ge ra kā-ǁō. As ǂâi-sa ǂgao-ba dao-ǁgau re tsî E-lob dao-ba sao.
English: To whom do I belong? Jehovah I will obey. My Father in heaven I will serve; I’ll pay my vows without reserve. He bought me at great cost; Devoted to him I’ll stay. To him I will give each moment I live. His name I’ll honor each day.

Damara: ǂHo-mi-sa ǂgaob ǃKhū-ba ra ôab, ǂhau-ǃnâ ǀgo-res ǃnâ-ū. Hoa-ǁae da ge ra gan-gan bi ǁÎb di kai ǃgâi-sib ǃgao. ǁÎb ra ǁkhā-ǁkhā da xūn ǃnâ-ū da dâb ǀkha ra ǁnâu-ǀnam. ǂHau-ǃnâ ǂgao-ba da ra om-khâi, î da ǁÎ-ba ǂkhî-ǂkhî.
English: Gracious Jehovah, we praise you and thank you. Father, we make these expressions in prayer. Trusting in you, we will serve you completely, Knowing we thrive under your tender care. Daily our errors reveal imperfection. For our transgressions forgiveness we seek. Thankful we are that our lives have been ransomed. Thankful we are that you know we are weak.

Damara: Tsū ǂâi-de xu da ra hâ-bē tsî da ǃgâin xa ra ǂâi. ǃKhūb mîs ge ǂgao-ba ra tsâ-ǀkhā tsî ǀgai-ba ra mā da. E-lob ge ǂhau-ǃnâ-na a ǀnam. E-lob ai da ra kō. ǂGaob hoab ǀkha da nî ǃoa-ba bi tsî ǀam-o-sib kō-se.
English: Grateful we are that you show love and kindness. Thank you for drawing us closer to you. Teach us to know you, and help us to serve you. Show us the way to be loyal and true. Thankful we are for your powerful spirit. Grateful we are for the courage to speak. May we be humble and happy to serve you; May we give thanks, for you favor the meek.

Damara: Je-ho-va ǃhūb-aib ǂgae-ǂgui-ao, sa-do ta a ǀnam tsî ra ǁnâu-ǀnam. Sa-du ǃoa-ba-sa ra ǃgôa-ǃgâ tsî tsēs hoa-sa ta nî ǃoa-ba du. Sa-du mî-sa ta hoa-ǁae nî sao. ǃKhūb hō-hō-ǃnâ-de ta a ǀnam! (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lo sa-du ge a-nu hâ ǂgaob ǃgam-si-ba xu ǃoa-ba-he-sa.
English: Jehovah God, I call to you and ask you: “Hear my prayer.” My wounds are deep and slow to heal; my load is hard to bear. Despondent thoughts and disappointed hopes have left me weak. O God of comfort, care for me; your favor I do seek. (CHORUS) Do raise me up; help me endure. When I’m in doubt, make my hope sure. From deep despair, I turn to you. Jehovah God, my strength renew.

Damara: Sa-du ku-rus ra kai-kai du. ǃHūb-aib tsî ǁkhâb ge nē-sa ra ǂhôa. Hui te re î ta ǁnā-ti ī tsî sa-du di ǀon-sa ǂan-ǂan ǁkhā. O ta ǂgaob hoab ǀkha nî ǃoa-ba du tsî ǁgau ǂgom-ǂgom-sa ta a sa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lo sa-du ge a-nu hâ ǂgaob ǃgam-si-ba xu ǃoa-ba-he-sa.
English: Your Word has been my comfort and a refuge when I’m weak, Expressing feelings dear to me in words I cannot speak. Please build in me the faith and trust that your Word does impart. And help me always know your love is greater than my heart. (CHORUS) Do raise me up; help me endure. When I’m in doubt, make my hope sure. From deep despair, I turn to you. Jehovah God, my strength renew.

Damara: Si-da ûib hoab ǃnâ da ge mâ tsēs hoa-sa nî sî-sen ǃgâi ǀon-sa E-lob ǀkha dī-sa. Je-ho-vab ai-ǃâ da ga ra ǃgâi-se dī o, o da ge kai-se nî ǂkhî-ǂkhî bi.
English: The meditation of my heart, The thoughts I ponder through the day— May they be pleasing to you, Lord, And keep me steadfast in your way. When worries weigh upon my mind And make me restless in the night, Then may I meditate on you And things I know to be upright.

Damara: Nē ǃhūb-aib ǃnâ kai ǀon-sa dī-ba-sen ǂgaos tsî ǁîb di ǁkhoa-ba ôas tsî ǁîb ǃnâ hâ-hâs ge a ǁau tsî ǁîb di ǀhō kai ǂgao da ga o, o da ge ǃKhūb ǃgâib ǃnâ hâ ti-de.
English: Whatever things are chaste and true, Whatever virtue there may be, Whatever things well-spoken-of— May thoughts of these bring peace to me. How precious are your thoughts, O God! Beyond all counting is their sum. So may I ponder your own words, Absorbed in them may I become.

Damara: Je-ho-vab di ǂâis ǃnâ da ra hâ-hâ ǂgao Tsî ǃgâi ǀon-sa ǀam-o-sib kō-se ra ǂgao. ǁÎb ai da ra kō ǂgao, a-ma-ba ao-ǁnâs ǃgao î da ǃgâi ǀon-sa ū-hâ ǀga-ra.
English: We thank you, Jehovah, each day and each night, That you shed upon us your precious light. We thank you that we have the priv’lege of prayer, That we can approach you with ev’ry care.

Damara: Ham-i ǀkhāb ai du mâ? Mâ e-lo-ba du ra ǃgâ? ǁÎb hî-na du ra ǀgo-re-ǀîb ge, nē-si du ra ǃoa-bab ge ǁî. ǀGam ǃkhū-ga tā ǃoa-ba, E-lo-sis ǀgo-ra-he ǁoa. ǀAms ais ge sa-du di ǁhûi-sa nî ǃgôa, mâ-ba du nî ǃoa-ba-sa.
English: We thank you, Jehovah, for your loving Son, Who conquered the world; by his faith he won. We thank you for guidance in doing your will. You lovingly help us our vows fulfill.

Damara: Ham-i ǀkhāb ai du mâ? Mâ e-lo-ba du ra ǃgâ? A-ma ta-mab tsî a-ma-aib hâ, ǁnā-a-ma-ga nē-si ǁhûi re. Nē ǃhūb-aib Kae-sa-ra sa-du ǂkhâ-ǃnâ-sa ū-hâ? ǃGâi nî ǃkhais ge E-lo-ba ǁnâu-ǀnam-sa, hoa-ǁae ǁîb ǂâi-sa dīs ǀkha.
English: We thank you, our God, for the honor to preach About your great name and the truth to teach. We thank you that soon all earth’s woes will be past, While your Kingdom blessings forever last.

Damara: Ham-i ǀkhāb ai ta mâ? E-lo-ba ta ge nî ǃgâ. Ti ǀhom-si ǁgû-ba ta nî ǃoa-ba, ti mî-ǁgui-gu ai ta nî mâ. ǁA-ma teb ge xui-ao, ǁÎb ǀkhāb ai ta nî mâ-ǀgai. Ti ûib hoa-ba ta ge ǁî-ba nî mā. ǁÎb ǀon-sa ta ge nî ǃgôa.
English: Pray to Jehovah, the Hearer of prayer. This is our priv’lege, for his name we bear. Open your heart as you would to a friend, Trust that on Him you can always depend. Pray to Jehovah each day.

Damara: ǀHom-si ǁGû ti ǁnae-am-sa du ǁnâu. Ti E-lo sa-du a ti ǀhō-sa. Sa-du ǀons ge kai-se a ǀga-pi. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va ti ǀgo-re-sa ǁnâu-am.
English: Pray to Jehovah, give thanks that we live, Asking forgiveness as we do forgive. May we confess to our God whom we trust. He is our Maker and knows we are dust. Pray to Jehovah each day.

Damara: Ai-os nē-tsēs di ǀkhaeb ǃa-ro-ma tsî ûi-ba mā te tsî dao-ǁgaus ǃgao. Sa-du ǃgâi kō-ǃgâs xa ta ra dâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va ti ǀgo-re-sa ǁnâu-am.
English: Pray to Jehovah when troubles appear. He is our Father and ever so near. Seek his protection, and look for his aid; He is our confidence; don’t be afraid. Pray to Jehovah each day.

Damara: ǃGâi-ba dī-sa ta ge ra tu-ra! Hui te ti ǃKhū î ta ǃnâb ǃnâ ǃgû. ǀGai-ba mā te re ti ǃgom-sin ǃgao. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Je-ho-va ti ǀgo-re-sa ǁnâu-am.
English: Hand in hand with our dear Father, We would humbly walk with him each day. Oh, how undeserved his kindness That he grants to those who seek his way! By his love God made provision; We may freely take his hand. So we make our dedication; With Jehovah we take our stand.

Damara: Hoa-ǀgai-xa Je-ho-va si-da di ǁgû, sa-du ǀon-sa da ǃa-nu-se nî ū-hâ. Sa-du ra ǂgao xūn ra a-ma kai. Tsî da ra ǀgo-re îb gao-si-ba hā. Sa-du mî-mā hâ kha-mi. Î da ǁîb di ǀkhae-ga mû.
English: In this day of Satan’s anger, As the end is drawing ever near, We are faced with opposition That could make us turn away in fear. But Jehovah gives protection; Close to him we want to stay, That we might forever serve him. Love him loyally, never stray.

Damara: Gan-gans si-da ǃKhū tsēs hoas ǀkhae-gu ǃgao. Sa-du ǀkhaeb ge hoa xūn ǂam-ai kai-se ǃgâi. Ûib di tsoa-tsoa tsî ǃnâb di mā-ao, Sa-do xu da hoa-ǁae ǂan-sa ra hō. Gan-gan du da ra hoa-ǁae, Sa-du di ǃgâi ǀgau-gu ǃgao.
English: Help for us God has provided Through his spirit and his written Word, Through the Christian congregation, Through assurance that our prayer is heard. As we’re walking with Jehovah, He will help us do what’s right. He will help us to be loyal And walk modestly in his sight.

Damara: Nē ǃhūb-aib ǃnâ da ǃgom-si-na ū-hâ. Sa-du ǃoa da ge ra kō ǂkhâ-ǃnâ-hes ǃgao. Si-da ǃgom-si-na da ra mā du. ǀGai-ba mā da re î da ai-ǃgû ǁkhā. Tsî sa-du ǂâi-sa dī hō, si-da mî-ǁgui-ga dīs ǀkha.
English: Great God, we’ve vowed to do your will; In wisdom your work we’ll fulfill, For then we know we’ll have a part In making glad your loving heart.

Damara: ǀKhom-xa Je-ho-va gan-gan du da ge ra. Si-da ǁGû nē-sa da ge ra ǀgo-re. ǂGom-ǃgâ du da ge ra tsî nî ǃoa-ba du. Sa-du kō-ǃgâs ǃna-ga da ge ra kai. Tsēs hoa-sab ǁo-re-ba si-da ǃnâ ra hâ. Si-da di ǁo-re-ba ǀû-ba da re. Gan-gan du da ge ra xo-re-ma-rib ǃgao. Gan-gans si-da mâ-si-ba du ǂan-sa.
English: Your slave, your steward here on earth, Declares your greatness and your worth And feeds us nourishment when due, To strengthen us your will to do.

Damara: Sa-du ǀnam-ma da ge kai-se ra ǃgôa-ǃgâ. Kai gan-gans si-da du ge ǂgae ǃkhais ǃgao. ǁKhā-ǁkhā da tsî hui da sa-do ǃoa-ba-sa. Dao-ǁgau da re î da ǂgom-ǂgom-sa ǁkhā. Gan-gan du da ra ǃa-nu ga-gab ams-ai. Kai gan-gans ǃhoas di ǁkhoa-ǂgao-sib ams-ai. ǃGam-ǃgam-sens tsî dâb ǀkha da ra ǃoa-ba du. Gan-gans tsam-tsi-na du ra ū-ǃoa o.
English: Impart to us your active force, That we may keep a faithful course And bring forth fruitage to your praise. May we make glad your heart each day.

Damara: Je-ho-va ǂgai du ta ge ra: “Ti ǀgo-re-sa ǁnâu re.” Kai-se ǃgam-se ta tsû hâ; nē tsûb ge ǃgom ta-ni-sa. ǂKha-bu-ǂâis tsî ǂkhî-o-ǃnâ-sib ge ra ǂkha-bu kai te. ǁKhae-ǂgaob E-lo kō-ǃgâ te; î ta sa-du ǃgâi-ba hō. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ū-khâi te re; î ta mâ-ǀgai. Ti ǃâu-ba-sen-sa ǀgai-ǀgai re. Tsû-ba xu ta sa-do ra ôa. Je-ho-va ǀgai-ba mā te re.
English: To Christ, by our God, Jehovah, we have been drawn To be his disciples from now on. From Jehovah’s lofty throne, How the light of truth has shone. In our hearts, our faith has grown; Our lives we vow to disown. (CHORUS) To God we are dedicated; This is our choice. In him and in Jesus we now rejoice.

Damara: Sa-du mîs ge ra ǁkhae-ǂgao te, ǂkha-bu ta ga ra o. Ti ǃnâ ǃgam-se hâ tsâ-si-ga ta ge a ǁgâi-ǂui ǁoa. Sa-du mîs ǃnâ-ū ǂgom-ǃgâ-si-ba om-khâi-ba te re. Î mû-ǂan kai te sa-du ǀnam-mi ti ǂgaob xa kai-sa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Ū-khâi te re; î ta mâ-ǀgai. Ti ǃâu-ba-sen-sa ǀgai-ǀgai re. Tsû-ba xu ta sa-do ra ôa. Je-ho-va ǀgai-ba mā te re.
English: In prayer we have come before Jehovah to say We’ll serve him forever and obey. It’s a joy beyond compare, One that we are glad to share, As Jehovah’s name we bear, And Kingdom truth we declare. (CHORUS) To God we are dedicated; This is our choice. In him and in Jesus we now rejoice.

Damara: Nēn ge ti ǂgaob ǂâi-ǂhan-sen-na, Nē ǂâi-na ta kom ra ǂâi-ǃgâ— A di sa-do dâ kai re ǃKhū, î sa-du daob ǃnâ ǀgai kai te. ǃGom-sin ga ti ǂâis ai hâ o tsî ga ra ǁom ǁoa kai te o, a ta ǁnâi sa-du xa ǂâi re. Tsî xūn hî-na a ǂha-nun xa.
English: Because Jehovah created The universe so grand, To him belong the earth and sky, The works of his own hand. The breath of life he has given And to his creatures shown That worthy is he to have the praise, The worship of all his own.

Damara: Xūn ga ǃa-nu tsî a-ma o, tae-i ǃgâib ǀguib ga hâ xa-we, ǃGâi-se ra ǃhoa-ai-he xūn kas— an nē xū-na ǂkhî-ba mā te. Sa-du ǂâi-di kai-se ǀga-pi! ǃGôa-he ǁoa-hen ge a hoa-na, a-ma-ga ta ǁîn xa ra ǂâi, ǁîn ǃnâ da nî hâ-hâ-se ī.
English: In water Jesus was baptized To righteousness fulfill. In solemn prayer he said to God: ‘I’ve come to do your will.’ When he came up from the Jordan As God’s anointed Son, Obedient and loyal he would pray: ‘My Father, your will be done.’

Damara: Gan-gan du da ra mâ tsēs tsî ǃuis hoas xa, Sa-du ǃgom-ǀgau-sa kai ǃnâb ǃa-ro-ma. Gan-gan du da ra ǀgo-res ai-ǂha-nub ǃgao. Mâ ǃgom-sib hoa-ba du ra ǁnâu ǃkhais ǃgao.
English: We come before you, Jehovah, To praise your name so great. Disowning self, with humble hearts, Our lives we dedicate. You gave your only begotten, Who paid the price so high. No longer as living for ourselves, For you we will live or die.

Damara: Gan-gan du da ra sa-du ǀgôab ǃa-ro-ma, ǁîb di ǂgoms ǃnâ ge ǃhūb-ai-ba da-na. Gan-gan du da ra sa-du di dao-ǁgaus xa, Sa-du ǂâi-sa dīs ǀkha du ra hui da.
English: Morning comes. Soon we will be On our way to preach good news. But it’s dark outside, And the rain starts to fall. It would be easy to stay inside, sleepy-eyed. (CHORUS) Positive thoughts and preparation, Praying that we’ll succeed; This can provide the inspiration, We’ll surely need. We’re not alone; the angels guide us. Jesus commands them all. And with a loyal friend beside us, We’ll never fall.

Damara: Gan-gan du da ra ao-ǁnâs ai-ǂha-nub xa, Sa-du kai ǀons tsî a-mab xas tsî-na. Gan-gan du da ra ǃgom-sin nî ǃgû ī-sa. Sa-du Gao-sib ge hoa-ǁae nî hâ-hâ.
English: Soon we’ll see Joy come our way If these things we keep in mind. And Jehovah sees Ev’ry effort we make, And he remembers the love we show; this we know. (CHORUS) Positive thoughts and preparation, Praying that we’ll succeed; This can provide the inspiration, We’ll surely need. We’re not alone; the angels guide us. Jesus commands them all. And with a loyal friend beside us, We’ll never fall.

Damara: E-lob ge ǀgo-re-di ǁnâu-am-ao-ba. Ai-ǂha-nub ge ǁîb ǀon-sa ta-ni-sa. Mî-ba bi re ma-ti du ra tsâ-sa. ǂGom-ǃgâ re ǁîb ai du nî-ra kō-sa. E-lo-ba hoa-ǁae gan-gan.
English: There is a way of peace, The way you’ve come to know. It is the way you learned, The way of long ago, The way that Jesus taught you When his voice you heard. This is the way of peace, Found in Jehovah’s Word. (CHORUS) This is the way to life; This is the way. Don’t look aside; Not for a moment stray! God’s voice is calling: ‘This is the way; Do not look back, for yes, this is the way.’

Damara: Je-ho-va-ba ûib ǃa-ro-ma koa re. ǀÛ-ba-ba ǂgan î du ǀû-ba-he ǁkhā. E-lob ai ǂgom-ai-ǂnûi tsî ǁgui-ǁnâ re. Ku-ru-aob ge ǂan tsa-ra da a-sa. E-lo-ba hoa-ǁae gan-gan.
English: There is a way of love, No need to look around. God’s voice has shown the way He lets himself be found. His love is full and good; His love is warm and true. This is the way of love; It touches all we do. (CHORUS) This is the way to life; This is the way. Don’t look aside; Not for a moment stray! God’s voice is calling: ‘This is the way; Do not look back, for yes, this is the way.’

Damara: ǃGom-ǁae-gu ǃnâ Je-ho-vab ǃoa ǀgo-re. ǁÎb si-da ǁGû tsî mâ-ǁaeb hoab ai ǀgū. ǁÎb hui-ba ôa tsî ǁîb xa sâu-he re. ǁÎb ai da ge ra ǂgom-ai-ǂnûi hoa-ǁae. E-lo-ba hoa-ǁae gan-gan.
English: There is a way of life, No need to look behind. Our God has promised us: No better way we’ll find, No higher way to peace, No finer way to love. This is the way to life, Thanks to our God above. (CHORUS) This is the way to life; This is the way. Don’t look aside; Not for a moment stray! God’s voice is calling: ‘This is the way; Do not look back, for yes, this is the way.’

Damara: Hā î da si-da ǁgûb ǀkha ǃgû. ǁÎb ǀkha da ge tsēs hoa-sa ra ǃgû. ǁÎb ǀkhom-mi ge kai-se a kai. ǁÎb ǀgau-ga ra ôa-nab ge ra mā! ǃKhūb ge ǀgau-e ge dī-ba da, a da ǁî-ba ǃoa kō re. Î da ǁîb ǃoa mā-ǁnâ-sen ǁkhā. Je-ho-vab ǀkhāb ai da ra mâ.
English: The way of the truth is the best way of living, But no one can live your life for you. So take the advice that Jehovah is giving; Believe what he tells you is true. (CHORUS) Make the truth your own. Make it live, yes, make it real. And then feel the joy Jehovah gives you When you make the truth your own.

Damara: ǁGâu-ab di ǁaib di tsē-di ǃnâ. Nē ǃhūb-aib di ǀams ta ǀgū kha-mi, da ra ǁkhan-he mâ-ǃoa-aon xa. ǁNās ge ǃa-ro-ma ǁkhā î da ǃao. Xa-we E-lob ge nî hui da. ǁÎb ǀgū-se da ge nî hâ, î da hâ-hâ ǁîb ǃoa-bas ǃnâ. Tsî ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se ǁî-ba ǀnam.
English: The effort you make and the time you are spending In service to God and his Kingdom Will yield rich results and a life that’s unending, A life full of good things to come. (CHORUS) Make the truth your own. Make it live, yes, make it real. And then feel the joy Jehovah gives you When you make the truth your own.

Damara: ǃKhūb ge si-da hui-ba ra mā, ǁîb mîs tsî ǃa-nu ga-gab ǃnâ-ū. Tsî Xris-te-ǁî ǀhao-hâb ǃnâ-ū. ǀGo-re-di tsî-nab ge ra ǁnâu-am. E-lob ǀkha da ra ǃgû hî-nab ge nî hui ǃgâi-na dī-sa. ǁÎb ge nî hui î da mâ-ǀgai tsî ǂha-nu-se dī ǁîb mû-ǁae.
English: Compared with our God, we are all little children And need his direction and counsel. So walk ev’ry day with our Father in heaven; Receive his rich blessing in full. (CHORUS) Make the truth your own. Make it live, yes, make it real. And then feel the joy Jehovah gives you When you make the truth your own.

Damara: ǃKhū sa-du ǂâi-sa da ra dī. Sa-du sî-sen-gu ge nî ǀoa. Nēs ǃnâ da ǃâ-e nî ū-hâ, Sa-du di ǂgao-ba dâ kais ǀkha.
English: We really want to imitate our God, To be impartial, as we know he is. To save all sorts of people is his will; He welcomes all to come and to be his. (CHORUS) It’s the person, not the place; It’s the heart and not the face. God’s message to all people we extend. So because we really care, We keep preaching ev’rywhere: “All sorts of people can become God’s friend.”

Damara: Sa-du di ǃoa-ba-aon hoan ge Sa-du kai-si-ba nî-ra ǂhôa. Sa-du ra om-khâi da hî-na, mâ-ǀgai kai da sa-du daob ǃnâ.
English: It doesn’t matter where they may be found Or what at first they might appear to be. What really counts is what they are at heart— The inner self, the one Jehovah sees. (CHORUS) It’s the person, not the place; It’s the heart and not the face. God’s message to all people we extend. So because we really care, We keep preaching ev’rywhere: “All sorts of people can become God’s friend.”

Damara: Sa-du ga-gab ǀkha hui da re, î da ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se hâ ǁkhā. Tsî ǃa-nu ga-gab ǂû-ga ǁgau tsî Sa-du di ǂgao-ba dâ kai.
English: Jehovah welcomes all who make the choice To leave the world and all its ways behind. This we have learned, and this we want to share, And so we preach to people of all kinds. (CHORUS) It’s the person, not the place; It’s the heart and not the face. God’s message to all people we extend. So because we really care, We keep preaching ev’rywhere: “All sorts of people can become God’s friend.”

Damara: Ū ti ǂgao-ba îb ǀnam du. A-mab ge ǃKhū-ba xu hâ. Ti dom-ma ū tsî ǁnae kai, î ta ti Gao-ao-ba koa.
English: Praise Jah with me; Come! Let us sing! He gives us life, breath, and ev’ry good thing. Each day and night, His name we bless, Praising his love and his almightiness. We sing his praise, and his name we confess.

Damara: Ū ti ǂai-ra tsî ǃom-kha, în Sa-du mî-mā-de sao. Ti hoa ma-ri-sa ū re. Xū-e ta ge ǃkhō-oa ǁoa.
English: Praise Jah with me; He satisfies. He hears our prayers as our needs he supplies. His mighty arm Strengthens the weak; His holy spirit sustains all the meek. His name we praise; Of his power we speak.

Damara: Ū ti ûi-ba i hau bi, Sa-du ǂâis ǀkha a ǀgui-se. Hui te re dī ta ran ǃnâ, î ta dâ kai du ti ǃKhū.
English: Praise Jah with me; Our God is just. He brings us comfort, in him we can trust. Wrongs he will right; Hearts he will heal. Rich Kingdom blessings all mankind will feel. Come let us praise him with joy and with zeal!

Damara: Xris-tub ǃnâ-ū da ge E-lob xa ǂgae-he hâ Î da ǁîb di ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sa-be kai. Je-ho-vab kai tron-sa xub, ge a-mab ǃnâ-ba ra hā. Si-da ǂgoms ra ǀgai kha-mi, da ǁÎb ǂâi-sa ra dī ǂgao. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lob ai da mā-ǁnâ-sen hâ; nēb ge mî-ǁgui. ǁÎb tsî Je-sub ǃnâ da ra ǃgâi-a-ǂgao.
English: Firm and determined in this time of the end, Prepared are God’s servants the good news to defend. The Devil has fought and opposed them. With Jehovah, they take their stand against him. (CHORUS) Then forward, you Witnesses, ever strong of heart! Rejoice that in God’s work, you too may have a part! Go tell far and wide that the Paradise is near And that soon all its blessings will be here.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ai-ǃâ da ge go hā ǀgo-res ǃnâ, î da ǃoa-ba tsî ǁnâu-ǀnam bi ǁkhā. ǁNā-sa da ǂkhîb ǀkha ra dī, nē ǂkhîb ge a ǀnō-he ǁoa. Je-ho-vab di khoen a-se, ǁîb Gao-sib xa da nî ǃhoa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) E-lob ai da mā-ǁnâ-sen hâ; nēb ge mî-ǁgui. ǁÎb tsî Je-sub ǃnâ da ra ǃgâi-a-ǂgao.
English: Servants of Jah do not seek a life of ease; The world and its rulers we do not try to please. Unspotted at all times remaining, Our integrity we will keep maintaining. (CHORUS) Then forward, you Witnesses, ever strong of heart! Rejoice that in God’s work, you too may have a part! Go tell far and wide that the Paradise is near And that soon all its blessings will be here.

Damara: Je-ho-va E-lob ge si-da ǀhom-mi di ku-ru-ao. ǃHūb-aib tsî ǀhom-mi ge ǁîb di ǃom-kha di sî-sen-ga. Ûi-bab ge ǁî-ba ge mā da tsî hoa da ra ǁkhā-ǁkhā, î da ǂan ǁîb ǀguib nî koa-he-sa, ǁÎ-ba ǀgo-re-ǀîs ǃnâ-ū.
English: God and his Kingdom are mocked and pushed aside; His great name is slandered, its holiness denied. Let’s share in its sanctification, And declare it to ev’ry tribe and nation. (CHORUS) Then forward, you Witnesses, ever strong of heart! Rejoice that in God’s work, you too may have a part! Go tell far and wide that the Paradise is near And that soon all its blessings will be here.

Damara: Je-sub Xris-tub ge ǁâ-ǁnâ-he, îb ǂha-nu-se dī ǁkhā. ǀGo-res ǃnâb ge E-lob ǃoa mî: ‘Sa ǂâi-sa ta nî dī.’ ǁGam-e xub ge a ǂoa-xa o, ob ge ǃKhūb xa ǂkhau-he. ǁNâu-ǀnam tsîb ge ǀgo-res ǃnâ ge mî: ‘As ti ǁgûb ti ǂâi-sa ī.’
English: Move ahead, move ahead to maturity! Shine the light of the truth so that all may plainly see. Try your best to improve in your ministry; Trust in God for true success. There’s a place in the service for all. It’s the work Jesus did, you’ll recall. Look to God for support that you may not fall, Standing firm for righteousness.

Damara: Je-ho-vab ai-ǃâ da go hā, î da ǁî-ba koa ǁkhā. Kai ǃgam-ǃgam-sen hâ ǂgao-gu ǀkha da ge mā-ǁnâ-sen hâ. Sa-du ǀGôa-ba du ge a mā, ǃgâi xū-e du ge dī. Ai-tsa-ma ta ûi-ba-sen ti-de, ûi tsî da ga ǁō xa-we.
English: Move ahead, move ahead, boldly witnessing! Everlasting good news to all sorts of people bring. Join in praise to Jehovah, our God and King, As we preach from door to door. Though opposers would like us to fear, Don’t hold back, but let ev’ryone hear. Tell the news that the Kingdom of God is here. Teach the truth yet more and more.

Damara: ǁGoas go hā. ǂHo-mi-sen re î da ǃgâi-ǂhôas xa sī ǃhoa. ǁAe xa i ge go tsî ǀa-nus ge go hā. Oms ǃnâ hâs ge a su-pu tsî ra ǁom kai da. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGâi mû-ǂuis tsî ai-ǂho-mi-sens ǀkha da ge hoa-ǁae ra ǃhoa. Nes ge nî ǂkhâ-ǃnâ da, ai-ǃgûs ǀkha tsî dī-tsâ-sa. Sî-sen-ǀhao da ra ǀhom-ǃgā-gu ǀkha. Je-sub ge ra hui da. Tsî ǂhau-ǃnâ ǀhō-sa-na da ū-hâ. Mâ-ǀgai da nî.
English: Move ahead, move ahead, always follow through, And improve in your skills, for there’s so much work to do. Let the spirit of God keep on leading you. Find the joy that is divine. Love the people you work hard to find. Keep returning to reach heart and mind. And assist them to grow and to be refined, So the light of truth will shine.

Damara: ǂKhîb go ǀoa. Hō-ǃâ da nî hoa-na da ǂâis ǃnâ ū-hâ. E-lob ge nî mû, hoa da di dī-tsâ-de. ǁÎb ge si-da ǀnam-ma nî ǂâi-hō, nēs a-ma. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) ǃGâi mû-ǂuis tsî ai-ǂho-mi-sens ǀkha da ge hoa-ǁae ra ǃhoa. Nes ge nî ǂkhâ-ǃnâ da, ai-ǃgûs ǀkha tsî dī-tsâ-sa. Sî-sen-ǀhao da ra ǀhom-ǃgā-gu ǀkha. Je-sub ge ra hui da. Tsî ǂhau-ǃnâ ǀhō-sa-na da ū-hâ. Mâ-ǀgai da nî.
English: The fullness of the Kingdom truth was long concealed. The truth about the promised King is now revealed. Jehovah in his mercy and his love of right Considered man’s condition in his sinful plight. He formed his purpose that his Son should rule the earth; In God’s due time the Kingdom rule would be brought to birth. And that he might arrange to bring his Son a bride, A little flock of chosen ones is glorified.

Damara: Kai ǂkhîb di daob ge hâ, ǁîb ge ǂan da go ba. ǁÎb xa da ǁkhā-ǁkhā-sen, ǃkha-ru ge ǁaeb kha-mi. Je-sub ge a mî kha-mi ǁîb di dom-ma ǁnâus, ǃnâb ge kai ǂkhî-ba hâ. Je-ho-vab di mîs ǃnâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Nēb ge ûib di ǀgau-ba; nēb ge dao-ba. Tā kō-bē re; ǁae-rob di ǁkhoa-rob ǃgao! E-lob ge ra ǂgai: ‘Nēb ge dao-ba, tā ǃgâb ai kō, nēb ge a-ma dao-ba.’
English: The good news that we now declare was long foreknown. Jehovah wills that in this time it would be shown. Along with us, his angels take delight to share, To aid us as the Kingdom truth we now declare. We have the duty and the honor in these days To sanctify his name and give him his rightful praise. We’re honored as his Witnesses that name to bear With everlasting good news that we now declare.

Damara: Kai ǀnam-mi daob ge hâ, tā kō mâ to-xo-ba. ǃKhūb ge dao-ba ra ǁgau, ǁîb ge ra hō kai-sen. ǁÎb ǀnam-mi ge a ǃgâi tsî ǀgam-sa tsî a-ma. Nēb ge ǀnam-mi dao-ba, dī da ra xūn hoan ǃnâ. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Nēb ge ûib di ǀgau-ba; nēb ge dao-ba. Tā kō-bē re; ǁae-rob di ǁkhoa-rob ǃgao! E-lob ge ra ǂgai: ‘Nēb ge dao-ba, tā ǃgâb ai kō, nēb ge a-ma dao-ba.’
English: God has commanded us this day; He has given us a charge to obey. At all times, be ready to impart The reason for the hope within your heart. (CHORUS) So preach the word So that ev’ryone can hear! Preach the word, For we know the end is near. Preach the word, Help the meek to understand. Preach the word Throughout the land!

Damara: Kai ûib di daob ge hâ, tā kai-se kō mâ re. ǃKhūb ge mî-mâi-ba da ǀkha-ra dao-i a ǀkhai ǂkhî-ba hōs ǃa-ro-ma, ǃgâi daob ǀnam-mi dib ai. Nēb ge ûib di dao-ba, gan-gans E-lo-ba ǃoa. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Nēb ge ûib di ǀgau-ba; nēb ge dao-ba. Tā kō-bē re; ǁae-rob di ǁkhoa-rob ǃgao! E-lob ge ra ǂgai: ‘Nēb ge dao-ba, tā ǃgâb ai kō, nēb ge a-ma dao-ba.’
English: Seasons of trouble we will face; Opposition may bring shame and disgrace. Though preaching may out of season seem, Our trust is in our God, who is supreme. (CHORUS) So preach the word So that ev’ryone can hear! Preach the word, For we know the end is near. Preach the word, Help the meek to understand. Preach the word Throughout the land!

Damara: Ais-ǀkhāb ǃoa kō re ti khoe-do, gao-sib xa du ao-ǁnâ re. Tā du khā-khoe-na ǃao re. A-ma-ba ǀnam-na mî-ba Je-sub Xris-tub ge ra ǂgae-ǂgui. Tsî khā-khoe-ba ge ao-ǁnâ tsî ǁî-ba nî-ra dī-kā-kā, în khoe-na ǃgâi-se ûi ǁkhā. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Tā ǃao nî re, ti ǀnam-sa-do. ǁÎn ǃao-ǃaos ga kai xa-we, du ge ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se nî hâ, ǃgom-ǀgau-sa-se hoa xūn ǃnâ.
English: Seasons of favor we will see, And the need for us to teach, there will be. The way to salvation we proclaim And help to sanctify Jehovah’s name. (CHORUS) So preach the word So that ev’ryone can hear! Preach the word, For we know the end is near. Preach the word, Help the meek to understand. Preach the word Throughout the land!

Damara: Sa-du khā-khoen ga ǂgui xa-we, tsû-tsû du ǂgaon ga xa-we. Koa tsîn ga ra ǀnom ū du, tsîn ga na-na du xa-we. Ti ǂgom-ǂgom-sa khoe-do tā ǃao, ǁîn sao-ǃgon-di kas hoa-sa. Ti ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-na ta nî sâu Ar-ma-ge-dons ga hā o. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Tā ǃao nî re, ti ǀnam-sa-do. ǁÎn ǃao-ǃaos ga kai xa-we, du ge ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se nî hâ, ǃgom-ǀgau-sa-se hoa xūn ǃnâ.
English: Come share in the work of our Master; Respond to his call and obey. He offers to help and to guide you; His teaching will show you the way. The seed of the truth has power to grow In hearts that are honest and true. So give of your best as you faithfully share In the work you’ve been given to do.

Damara: Tā ǃao ǀgu-ri du hâ ta-ma, Ti-ta ge sa-du di ǀgai. Nē-si du ga ǁō xa-we, ǁōb ge ti-ta a ǁau-ba. Tā so-ro-sa ra ǃgam-na ǃao tsî ûi-ba mā ǁoan tsî-na. ǀAms kō-se du mâ-ǁa-po re, Sa-du mî-ǁgui-ga dīs ǀkha! (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Tā ǃao nî re, ti ǀnam-sa-do. ǁÎn ǃao-ǃaos ga kai xa-we, du ge ǂgom-ǂgom-sa-se nî hâ, ǃgom-ǀgau-sa-se hoa xūn ǃnâ.
English: How much of your work is successful May often depend much on you. Those hearing will need your assistance To learn and to love what is true. So help them to deal with pressures and doubts They’re certain to face on their way. The seed of the truth will bring joy when you see How it grows in their heart day by day.

Damara: A-ma-ba ûi-ǂuis ge kai-se a ǃgâi ǀgau-ba, khoe-i nē-sa a dī-ba tsi ǁoa. Je-ho-vab ra mā tsi ǀa-pe-mā-de ū re tsî ǂgom re ǁîb ra mî xū-na. (ǁNAEǀHAOS) Nēb ge a-ma-ba. Ûi-ǂui tsî a-ma kai re. Tsî ǃgâi-a-ǂgao re Je-ho-vab ǀkhaeb ǀkha, a-mab ǃnâts ta ǀgai hî-na.
English: In preaching the Kingdom and teaching the truth, Our Lord showed us how to proceed: ‘Search out those deserving and ready to hear, Those aware of their spiritual need.
